Ella necesita este credito para la compra de catalogos, zapatos, blusas, shorts, pantalones, camisas, calsetines, ropa interior y vestidos para su posterior venta.
Ella se encuentra muy agradecida con la Fundacion por la confianza que le dio.
texts.en:
Yaracet is 25 years old, and she attended high school until the third semester.  She is married to Luis, who works as a day laborer.  They have two children.  One is six years old, and the other is eight months.  The oldest goes to elementary school.

She tells us that she has always been concerned about helping her husband with the household expenses.  Two years ago she started selling women’s and men’s clothing door to door to her friends and neighbors in the community.

She tells us that the business has gone well for her.  She wants to make it grow by starting to sell shoes by catalog.  She will do this in order to have more customers and increased income.  That way she will be able to give her family a better quality of life, and her children will be able to study for a profession in the future.

She needs this loan to buy catalogs, shoes, blouses, shorts, pants, shirts, socks, underwear, and dresses for her to later sell.

She is grateful to the Fundación for the trust they have placed in her.

loans.use: to sell clothes.

loans.name: Jusup

texts.ru:
Жусуп – 44 –летний фермер из села Орто-Суу. Женат и воспитывает троих детей.  Жусуп – активный участник различных мероприятий в родном селе и со стороны односельчан характеризуется как добропорядочный, трудолюбивый и дружелюбный человек. 15 лет назад со стартовым капиталом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) Жусуп начал свой бизнес в закупе, разведении и перепродаже скота.   На сегодняшний день,  его ферма насчитывает 5 коров и 29 овец, ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS).  Дополнительным источником доходов семьи является фруктовый сад, урожай от которого Жусуп продает на местном рынке. 
Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жусуп обратился в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры»  за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS). В будущем, с помощью кредита, Жусуп планирует оплатить учебу для своих детей в престижном университете. 
ЗАО МФК "Бай-Тушум и Партнеры"  (CJSC “Bai Tushum & Partners”  MFC)предоставляет кредиты по линии Кива для социально-уязвимых слоев населения. ЗАО МФК "Бай-Тушум и Партнеры" является одной из лидирующих Микрофинансовых организаций Кыргызстана. "Бай-Тушум и Партнеры" – это надежный финансовый партнер, осуществляющий вклад в развитие экономики Кыргызской Республики путем предоставления доступных микрофинансовых услуг в сельской местности и городах, способствующих созданию рабочих мест и отвечающий интересам своих клиентов и инвесторов.
texts.en:
Jusup is a 44-year-old farmer from the village of Ortosuu. He is married and has three children. Jusup is an active participant in various activities in his native village, and the villagers describe him as a respectable, hardworking, and friendly person. Fifteen years ago with start-up capital amounting to 100,000 som (KGS), Jusup started his business buying, breeding, and selling livestock. Today, his farm has five cows and 29 sheep.  His monthly income is about 10,000 som (KGS). An additional source of family income is an orchard whose produce Jusup sells in the local market.

To further develop his business, Jusup turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS). In the future, with the help of the loan, Jusup plans to pay his children's tuition to a prestigious university.

ZAO MFK Bai Tushum & Partners provides loans through Kiva for socially vulnerable population regions. ZAO MFK Bai Tushum & Partners is one of the leading micro financing organizations in Kyrgyzstan. Bai Tushum & Partners is a reliable financial partner which makes an impact in development of the economy in the Republic of Kyrgyzstan, provides affordable micro lending services in the rural towns and cities, helps to create jobs and is responsible for the interests of their clients and investors.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Adoradila

texts.es:
La señora Adoradila tiene la edad de 41 años, estudio solo la primaria y esta soltera. Ella nos platica que siempre le ha gustado trabajar pero que hace poco mas de dos años abrio una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su casa, primero inicio vendiendo refrescos y dulces pero poco a poco la ha hecho crecer y actualmente tambien vender abarrotes. Ella nos dice que decidio poner su propia tienda de abarrotes para ganar un poco de dinero extra y asi ayudar s sus padres ademas de que ella se ha dado cuenta qye es un buen negocio ya que siempre se vende aunque sea un poquito. Ella necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra de refrescos, arroz, jabon en polvo, jabon de barra, cloro, shampoo y pasta dental para resurtit su negocio y sus clientes esten satisfechos ya que siempre se encuentren lo que busquen.
Ella se encuentra muy contenta y nos dice que espera que su negocio prospere mas dia con dia.
texts.en:
Adoradila, 41, is single and has an elementary school education.  She tells us that she has always enjoyed working, but a little more than 2 years ago she opened her own grocery store in her home.  She started out selling soft drinks and sweets, but gradually she has made the business grow and now it has expanded to become a grocery store.  She tells us that she decided to set up her own grocery store so that she could earn a bit more money and in this way help her parents.  Also, she had realized that this is a good business because she always sells, even if it is just a little.  She needs this loan to invest in the purchase of soft drinks, rice, powdered detergent, bars of soap, bleach, shampoo and toothpaste to restock her store, so that her customers will be satisfied since they will always find what they are looking for.

Adoradila is very content, and tells us that she hopes that her business will prosper more each day.

loans.use: to stock up her grocery store

loans.name: Yesenia

texts.es:
La joven Yesenia tiene la edad de 18 años, solo estudio la primaria y es soltera.
Ella nos platica que cuando termino de estudiar la primaria tuvo que dejar la escuela ya que sus padres no tenian los recuersos para darle estudios y tuvo que iniciar a trabajar primero en los queaseres del hogar para hace a un poco mas de dos años a iniciado a trabajar en su propio negocio de venta de pollo destasado, ella realiza sus ventas de lunes a sabados y dice que se levanta muy temprano para aliñar los pollos y cuando ya esta listo el pollo, lo pone en una cubeta y sale a ofrecerlo casa por casa con sus amigos y vecinos de la comunidad.
Ella nos platica que en algunas ocaciones su madre la ayuda, ella necesita este credito para invertirlo en la compra de pollo para su posterior venta, tambien nos dice que espera en un futuro poder tener su propio creadero de pollos y que desea que su negocio cresca cada dia mas, para poder continuar ayudando a su madre con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 18 years old and single. She only went as far as primary school.  She tells us that when she completed primary she had to leave school since her parents didn't have the resources to send her.  She had to begin working, first doing household chores, until a little more than two years ago she began her own business selling cut-up chickens. 

She sells Mondays to Saturdays and says that she gets up very early to prepare her chicken. When it's ready she puts it on a tray, and goes out to sell it door-to-door to her friends and neighbors in the community. She tells us that sometimes her mother helps her. 

She needs this loan in order to buy chicken to sell.  She also says that in the future she hopes to raise her own chickens. She wants her business to grow day by day, so that she can continue helping her mother with household expenses.

loans.use: To sell chicken

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: Adrian, tiene la edad 21 de  años, está soltero y vive con sus padres y hermanos. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de insumos para su plantación de frijol. El cuenta con un terreno apto para la siembra de frijol y pretende invertir en insumos como abonos y fungicidas y mano de obra  para obtener una buena cosecha. El quiere implantar un frijolar que de buena producción para vender un producto de calidad en el mercado local o en lugares aledaños y también para autoconsumo. El quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su  familia y crecer con el proyecto del frijol. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Adrian is 21 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and siblings. With this loan he hopes to purchase supplies for his bean fields. He has a plot of land that is suitable for planting beans. He will invest in inputs such as fertilizer and fungicides and will pay for labor so that he can have a good harvest. He wants to establish a bean farm with good outputs so that he can sell a quality product in the local market and in neighboring areas. His work is for his own consumption as well. He wants to generate a greater amount of income for his well-being and for that of his family and expand his bean business. 

This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously he had not received other loans from state-run banks, but FUDECOSUR granted him this loan with more ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to sow beans.

loans.name: G.s El Carmen Group

texts.es: Las socias Pía Bonifacia y Karem conforman el grupo solidario El Carmen. Ellas son personas responsables y disfrutan de su actividad económica. Karem  se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa, tiene más de 4 años en este negocio, sus esfuerzos cada día por brindar a su familia los ingresos necesarios. La ubicación de su actividad es de manera ambulante ya que de esta manera obtiene más clientes. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de polvos, cremas, pinturas de labios, tratamientos,  pintura de uñas entre otros.
texts.en: The members, Pía Bonifacia and Karem, belong to the “El Carmen” solidarity group.  They are responsible people who enjoy their economic activity.  Karen sells cosmetics and clothes.  She’s been in business over four years and strives daily to provide her family with the necessary income.  She sells door to door in order to obtain more customers.  The loan she’s asking for is to buy powder, creams, lipstick and nail polish, among others.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Maria Leucadia

texts.es: María Leucadia es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable en sus actividades desde muy pequeña le inculcaron sus padres el amor por la tierra. Su localidad es muy conocida por tener una tierra de muy buena calidad donde su principal actividad económica es el cultivo de aguacate y la artesanía de Ocoshal. Leucadia tiene 52 años de edad es casada y tubo 7 hijos pero nada mas 5 son dependientes de ella todos pequeños y los cuales estudian la primaria y la secundaria. Comenta que hay 2 temporadas de cosecha de sus árboles de aguacate donde obtiene buenas ganancias y en esas temporadas ella y sus hijos quienes le ayudan a cortar el fruto salen a vender por cubetas en la central de abastos de una población cercana a su localidad. Ella tiene con esta actividad desde hace poco más de 4 años, comenta que cuando no es temporada de aguacate también se dedica a vender artesanía de Ocoshal en la ciudad de México. Leucadia esta pidiendo un préstamo para seguir comprando arbolitos de este fruto para hacer un poco más grande su huerta, también comprara abonos y fertilizantes e insecticidas para que no tengan plagas sus árboles. La señora Leucadia esta muy agradecida por el préstamo que le están haciendo por que su negocio crecerá un poco mas y la calidad de vida de sus hijos mejorara.
texts.en: María Leucadia is a hardworking woman who is responsible in her various activities.  From the time she was very young, her parents instilled in her a love of the land.  Her area is well known to have very good quality land where the main economic activities are cultivating avocados and making handicrafts using ocoshal leaves.  Maria Leucadia is 52 years old, married, and has 7 children, but only 5 are still dependent upon her because they are still small and are studying in the elementary and secondary schools.  She comments that there are 2 harvest seasons for her avocado trees, and she gets good earnings from them.  During the harvest times her children help her to cut the fruit and take it out to sell buy the bucket to the wholesalers in a town near her area.  She has been doing this work for more than 4 years, and she comments that when it is not harvest season she also works selling handicrafts made from ocoshal leaves in Mexico City.  Maria Leucadia is asking for a loan to continue to buy young avocado trees so that she can gradually expand her orchard.  She will also use the loan to buy manure, fertilizers and insecticides so that her trees do not have pests.  Maria Leucadia is very grateful for the loan that is being granted to her, because her business will grow a bit more, and the quality of life of her children will improve.

loans.use: to cultivate avocados and to sell handicrafts

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es: Amelia cuenta con 58 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, ella es originaria de una localidad donde todavía sus raíces las tienen muy bien arraigadas donde la gente todavía habla y visten el mazahua. Su principal actividad económica es la venta de artesanías de Ocoshal el cual la materia prima la obtienen del los árboles de encino. Doña Amelia es viuda y tubo 5 hijos pero ella vive sola, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artesanías de Ocoshal las cuales las vende a personas que van a su localidad a comprar ese tipo de artesanias para revenderlas y abeces sale a venderlas a la ciudad de Mexico y ahorita esta emprendiendo un negocio de cultivo de aguacate ya que ella ve que si es un buen negocio, esta pidiendo un crédito para la compra de material para hacer sus artesanías como agujas, hilo, una tina grande, plantas de aguacate y fertilizantes orgánicos para no maltratar la tierra. Doña Amelia esta muy contenta por el préstamo que le están haciendo ya que así podrá tener otra fuente de empleo y tal vez más adelante emplear a la gente de su población para que le ayuden con el cultivo de los árboles de aguacate.la meta que tiene es tener su huerta de aguacate y mas adelante sembrar durazno.
texts.en: Amelia, 58, is a hard-working, enterprising woman.  She is from a place which still has very strong roots and the people still speak and dress in the Mazahua tradition.  Her main activity is selling Ocoshal crafts which are made from shrub pine wood.  Doña Amelia is a widow with five children, but she lives alone.  She makes and sells Ocoshal crafts to people in her village who buy it for resale.  Sometimes she travels to Mexico City to sell her products.  She also grows avocados since she sees this is a good business.  She is requesting a loan to buy material for her crafts such as needles, thread and a large tub, as well as avocado plants and organic fertilizer that won't hurt the land.  Amelia is grateful for the loan which will allow her to have another source of income.  Perhaps in the future she will hire someone from the village to help her with the avocado crop.  Her goal is to have an avocado plantation and in the future begin to grow peaches.

loans.use: To grow avocados and make Ocoshal crafts.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma es casada tiene 31 años de edad y tiene 3 niños 2 estudiantes de primaria y un niño de 1 año, ella se dedica al cultivo de aguacate y maíz desde hace 2 años para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ella dice “empecé con este negocio de cultivo por que lo que me daba mi señor como jornalero no me alcanzaba para los gastos de mis niños por que a veces hay trabajo y a veces no, por eso decidimos que yo también trabajara aunque sea en la casa para estar al pendiente de mis hijos” ella esta pidiendo un préstamo a la financiera para la compra de árboles de aguacate,  para abonos orgánicos  y para comprar semilla del maíz ya que cuando no es temporada de aguacate ella vende maíz a sus vecinos y a veces también hace artesanías de Ocoshal, dice que cuando es temporada de aguacate salen a venderlos a una población cercana a la de ella por kilos o por bolsas ya que así le ganan un poco mas. La meta que tiene Irma es seguir invirtiéndole en el negocio del aguacate ya que si deja un poco mas de ganancias que la venta de la artesanía.
texts.en: Irma, 31, is married and has three children, two in primary school and the youngest who is one year old.  She has been growing avocados and corn for two years in order to help her husband with the household expenses.  She says "I began the crop-growing business because what my husband was giving me from his wages was not enough to cover my children's expenses.  Sometimes there was work and other times there wasn't any.  So we decided that I should work too, even though it meant staying close to home to attend to the children."  She is rquesting a loan to buy avocado trees and organic fertilizer, as well as corn seeds.  When it is not avocado season she sells corn to the neighbors and sometimes she makes Ocoshal crafts.  In avocado season she goes out to a nearby town and sells them by the kilo or in bags since she can earn a little more.  Irma's goal is to continue with her avocado business since it provides a little more profit than the craft business.

loans.use: To grow avocados and corn.

loans.name: Maria Crisanta

texts.es: Crisanta tiene 28 años de edad esta casada y tiene 3 niños una niño de 8 años una niña de 5 años y un pequeño de un año, ella es originaria de una localidad rica en pinos donde la gente de la región cuidan y protegen de los talamontes ya que la mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a la elaboración de artesanías de Ocoshal donde la materia prima la obtienen de los árboles de encino. Ella se dedica a realizar artesanías de Ocoshal y al cultivo de aguacate desde hace 7 años, dice que en tiempo de cosecha ella y su esposo cortan el fruto y lo sacan a vender a la ciudad de Toluca en la central de abastos ya que ahí se lo compran a muy buen precio y así le pueden dar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Ella esta pidiendo  un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos e insecticidas para que salgan fruto de una buena calidad. La meta que tiene Crisanta es sacar adelante a sus hijos que tengan estudio por que dice ella “quiero que mis hijos estudien por que el trabajo en el campo es muy pesado y no quiero sufran, quiero echarle muchas ganas para terminarles de hacer su casa de concreto por que cuando vivíamos en la  casa de madera se me enfermaban mucho por que le entraba el frío”.
texts.en: Crisanta, 28, is married and has three children, an 8-year-old boy, a 5-year-old girl and a 1-year-old boy.  She is from a place where there are many pine trees and local people take care to protect them from illegal loggers.  Most of the population makes Ocoshal crafts and use the shrub pine as raw material.  For seven years she has been making Ocoshal crafts and growing avocados.  At harvest time she and her husband cut down the fruit and take it to the city of Toluca for sale at the wholesale market.  There they can get a very good price for their produce, which lets them give their children a better quality of life.  She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and insecticides so the fruit will be of good quality.  Crisanta's goal is to help her children get an education.  She says "I want my children to study because farm work is very hard and I don't want them to suffer.  I want to work hard to finish building a concrete house because when we lived in the wood house they used to get sick because of the cold.".

loans.use: To grow avocados and make Ocoshal crafts.

loans.name: Colette

texts.fr:
Mariée, Colette vit dans la maison familiale de ses parents avec ses 2 enfants qui évoluent très bien dans leurs études. Colette est aidée dans le ménage par son mari en ce qui concerne les charges familiales. 
Il s'agit d'une cliente dynamique et expérimentée qui s'adonne comme activité à la fabrication de savons locaux communément appelés Kogui qu'elle distribue aux ménages de sa zone, aux petits détaillants du marché et autres. Pour son activité, elle s'approvisionne en divers matières premières telles que huile, soude, parfums et autres ingrédients entrant dans la préparation du savon au marché international du Bénin nommé Tokpa. 
Le relation est à son 5ème crédit obtenu pour augmenter son fonds de roulement afin de mieux répondre aux demandes croissantes de sa clientèle d'une part, effectuer des achats en gros afin de minimiser les coûts de fabrication et de tirer plus de revenus pour la survie de ses enfants d'autres parts. 
Le plus grand projet de Colette est de parvenir à améliorer son mode de préparation, son emballage et enfin disposer d'une boutique appropriée pour le stockage de ses produits pour la grande satisfaction de ses clients.
texts.en: Colette is a married woman living in her parents' family home with her two children, who are doing very well in their studies. She is helped at home by her husband as far as family expenses are concerned. We have here a client who is very energetic and experienced and who devotes herself to a business for making local soaps commonly called kogui, which she distributes to households in her area, to small-scale retailers at the market, and to others. For her business, she gets her supplies from Tokpa, the international market of Benin. These supplies include various raw materials, such as oil, caustic soda, perfumes, and other ingredients for making soap. Our client is now on her fifth loan to increase her working capital, so as to respond better to the growing demands of her customers on the one hand and to make wholesale purchases for minimizing production costs on the other hand. Thus, she will make more revenues for the survival of her children. The biggest of Collette's projects is to achieve improvements in her production method and in packaging and to obtain in the end a store suitable for stocking goods for really satisfying her customers.

loans.use: to buy five 50-liter containers of oil,10 boxes of perfume, and caustic soda

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es: Agustin, tiene la edad 67 de  años, está casado y vive con su esposa. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de una vaca lechera . El cuenta con varios vacas en su poder y lo que pretende es comprar otra para la venta de leche. El quiere tener varias vacas lecheras que sean de buena raza y que produzcan bastante leche para su posterior venta en  la localidad o lugares aledaños. El quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su esposa y crecer con le proyecto de la lecheria. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Agustin is 67 years old. He is married and he lives with his wife. With this loan he hopes to purchase a dairy cow. He already has several cows and he wants to buy another one so that he can sell milk. He wants to have several dairy cows that are of a good pedigree and that produce enough milk so that he can then sell the milk in his town and in neighboring areas. He wants to generate a greater amount of income for his well-being and for that of his wife and to expand his milk business.

This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously he had not received other loans from state-run banks, but FUDECOSUR granted him this loan with more ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Adonay

texts.es: Adonay, tiene la edad 46 de  años, está casada y vive con su esposo e hijos. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de concentrado para el engorde de cerdos. Ella cuenta con varios cerdos a su poder y lo que pretende es darle alimentación con concentrado para obtener un engorde más rápido. Ella quiere tener sus animales con el peso ideal en un corto plazo para su posterior venta en el mercado local. Elal quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar y la de su familia y crecer con el proyecto de cría de cerdos. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Adonay is 46 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and children. With this loan she hopes to purchase concentrate to fatten up her pigs. She has several pigs and she wants to give them food with concentrate so that they will fatten up faster. She wants her animals to reach an ideal weight in a short time period so that she can then sell them in the local market. She wants to generate a greater amount of income for her well-being and for that of her family and to expand her business raising pigs.

This is her first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously she had not received other loans from state-run banks, but FUDECOSUR granted her this loan with more ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to fatten pigs.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Clarisse A.

texts.fr:
Clarisse est mariée et a à charge 3 enfants qui vont tous à l'école. La relation vit en location avec ses enfants et son mari, pasteur de l'église Mission Evangelique des Nations située à Womey, un quartier de la banlieue de Cotonou, la capitale du Bénin. Elle est aidée au foyer par son mari. 
Coiffeuse de formation, Clarisse exerce son métier dans son atelier sis aux abords d'une voie pavée très fréquentée non loin de son domicile. Parallèlement, elle commercialise des produits accessoires (mèches, produits cosmétiques etc....). Sa clientèle est constitué des dames et des ménages de sa zone et de ses environs. Pour achalander son atelier, elle effectue des approvisionnements à Tokpa, le marché international du Bénin. 
Au terme de son 1er crédit, elle a sollicité un renouvellement qu'elle FINADEV pour le renforcement de son stock de provisions et pour diversifier ses produitrs en vue d'une meilleure satisfaction des attentes de la clientèle. Le bénéfice qu'engendrera le présent prêt lui permettra d'améliorer sa qualité de vie en supportant quelques charges de sa famille.
texts.en: Clarisse is a married woman supporting three children, who all go to school. Our client rents a place to live with her children and husband, a pastor of the Mission Evangelique des Nations Church in Womey, a district in the suburbs of Cotonou, the economic capital of Benin. She is helped at home by her husband. A hairdresser by training, Clarisse works at her trade in a salon located along a bustling paved path not far from her home. Concurrently, she sells accessories (hair extensions, cosmetic products, etc…) Her customer base is composed of women and households in and around her area. For making her salon busy with customers, she supplies herself from Tokpa, the international market of Benin. Finished with her first loan, she has requested a renewal at the micro-finance institution FINADEV to bolster her stock of provisions and to diversify her products with the aim of satisfying further the expectations of her customers. The profits generated from the present loan will enable her to improve her quality of life by covering some family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 20 dozen hair extensions, 2 boxes of straightener, a box of ointment, and box of shampoo and conditioner

loans.name: Bolivar

texts.es: Bolivar, tiene la edad 52 de  años, está soltero y vive con su madre. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de lechones para la crianza y engorde de ellos. El cuenta con un chiquero y lo que pretende es comprar lechones para darle alimentación con concentrado para su engorde más rápido. El quiere tener sus animales con el peso ideal para su posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad o lugares aledaños. El quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su madre y crecer con el proyecto de cría de cerdos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Bolivar is 52 years old. He is single and lives with his mother. With this loan he hopes to purchase piglets to raise and fatten them. He has a pig pen and he wants to purchase piglets so that he can give them food with concentrate to fatten them up faster. He wants his animals to reach an ideal weight so that he can then sell them in the town market and in neighboring areas. He wants to generate a greater amount of income for his well-being and for that of his mother and to expand his business raising pigs.

This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously he had not received other loans from state-run banks, but FUDECOSUR granted him this loan with more ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to fatten.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive is 40 years old and lives in West Point, Liberia. She is married and went to school, finishing the 4th grade.  Her husband is a mechanic servicing motorcycles.  They have two children aged 26 and 19, both of whom have finished school.  

For more than 20 years Olive has been cooking and selling dried plantain chips from a table in front of her house.  Her biggest worry is the lack of customers and the small amount that each one spends.  Her mother showed her how to run her own business.  She is proud that the business enables her to get money to look after her family.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more food for her business.  In the future, she plans to build up some savings

loans.use: to purchase more food for her business.

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es: Aurelio, tiene la edad 53 de  años, está casado y vive con su esposa ye hijos. El pretende con el crédito realizar la asistencia de  café. El cuenta con un terreno sembrado de café y pretende invertir en insumos como abonos, fungicidas y mano de obra para darle un mejor mantenimiento y así obtener una mejor cosecha. El quiere implantar un cafetal que genere una buena producción para vender  café de calidad. El quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su familia y crecer con el proyecto del café. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Aurelio is 53 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and children. With this loan he wants to invest in his coffee fields. He has a plot of land that he planted with coffee and he wants to invest in inputs such as fertilizer and fungicides and in labor so that he can maintain his land better and have a better harvest. He wants to establish a coffee plantation that produces well so that he can sell quality coffee. He wants to generate a greater amount of income for his well-being and for that of his family and to expand his coffee business.

This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously he had not received other loans from state-run banks, but FUDECOSUR granted him this loan with more ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for his coffee fields.

loans.name: Pedro Luis

texts.es: Pedro D. 53 años y vive en el suroccidente D. L. ciudad, donD.  venD. raspado, una ralladura D. helado, a L. cual le agregan esencias D.  rosa, fresa, tamarindo o limón cubierto con leche condensada y muy apetecido en el Caribe Colombiano, por sus características D. refrescante, que consume L. gente  para apaciguar L. sed, producto D. los incesantes días soleados y D. calor permanente. Pedro diariamente sale por todas las calles D. su barrio y aledaños, pedaleando  en su carruaje, que contiene todos los insumos para preparar el delicioso “Raspao” como lo llaman,  en el momento en que el cliente lo solicite; muchas veces se ubica en colegios, esperando que los estudiantes  terminan sus jornadas y ahí casi siempre hace su gran venta, y  así, continua en su bicicoche alquilado, por muchos barrios del suroccidente D. BarranquilL., donD. ya es bien conocido desD. hace 7 años. Pedro con este negocio ha ganado el respeto D. L. comunidad, es un hombre serio  y ha logrado generar ingresos para su hogar conformado por su esposa y sus 4 hijos en las edades D. 15 a 32 años.  Para Pedro, que ya conoce su clienteL. y con elL. gana un buen dinero, ya es tiempo D. comprar su carro D. raspado para no seguir pagando arriendo, porque le sale más costoso arrendar que hacer un crédito y sacar L. cuota D. él. Esta es L. razón por L. cual acuD. a su credikiva, primer crédito que hace a L. Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará su medio D. producción. Esta inversión es exitosa porque le permite además D. adquirir su vehículo sin pagar arriendo,  hacer un ahorro programado e irse preparando para acceder a los programas D. vivienda con subsidio del estado y cumplir su gran sueño D. tener su propia casa.
texts.en: Pedro, 53, lives in the southwestern part of the city where he sells "raspado" (ice dessert).  He offers rose, strawberry, tamarind or lemon flavors covered with condensed milk which is very popular in the Colombian Caribbean area.  This refreshment is consumed by the locals to calm their thirst resulting from the hot sunny days.  Every day Pedro rides through the streets in his neighborhood and nearby villages to sell his delicious "Raspao", which is what it is called.  He frequently parks near schools at the end of the day and sells to the students.  Then he takes his rented bicycle cart through the southwestern neighborhoods of BarranquilL. where he is well-known after having worked there seven year.  Pedro has been able to gain respect in the community for what he does.  He is a serious man and has been able to generate income for his household comprised of his wife and four children, ages 15 to 32.  For Pedro, the time has come for him to buy his own cart so he doesn't have to rent any more, as it is more expensive.  He has decided to request his first credikiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation.  This will allow him to buy a vehicle and begin a savings program.  He wants to prepare for a state subsidized housing program so that one day he can have his own house.

loans.use: To buy a bicycle cart.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock for her business.

loans.name: Greivin

texts.es: Greivin, tiene la edad 22 de  años, está en unión libre y vive con su cónyuge, la madre y un sobrino. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de insumos para la asistencia de  café. El cuenta con un terreno sembrado de café y pretende invertir en el pago de mano de obra, compra de insumos como abonos, fungicidas para el mantenimiento del cafe y así obtener una mejor cosecha. El quiere implantar un cafetal que genere ganancias por medio de la producción y asi vender  café de calidad. El quiere generar ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su familia y crecer con el proyecto del café. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Greivin is 22 years old. He lives in a common law marriage and lives with his partner, his mother and one nephew. With this loan he wants to purchase inputs to improve his coffee fields. He has a plot of land that he planted with coffee and he wants to invest in paying for labor and in purchasing inputs such as fertilizers and fungicides to maintain his coffee and have a better harvest. He wants to establish a coffee plantation that generates income by growing coffee and selling a quality product. He wants to generate a greater amount of income for his well-being and for that of his family and to expand her coffee business.

This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously he had not received other loans from state-run banks, but FUDECOSUR granted him this loan with more ease and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase inputs for his coffee fields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy zinc, supports, screws, sand, and cement for a roof and walls

loans.name: Miladis Judith

texts.es: Miladis de 47 años, es la propietaria del negocio “Distribuidora Miller” , allí se dedica a la venta de pollo, pechugas, huevos, muslos, jamón, mortadela y salchichón. Miladis vive en Soledad con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 13 a 25 años de edad, e inició en el año 2009 un negocio porque como empleada no conseguía trabajo y sentía la necesidad de apoyar los gastos del hogar, que hasta ese momento estaban a cargo de su cónyuge. Antes de iniciar su negocio Miladis indagó entre sus vecinos y encontró que la venta de pollo entero o porcionado, era una buena opción, así que invirtió su pequeño capital e inició en su propia casa, con una gran acogida y  esto la llevó a arrendar un local; de este misma actividad se derivó posteriormente la venta de huevos y embutidos, como hasta ahora lo tiene. Sus ventas las realiza de contado, pero su creciente y exigente clientela cada día solicita mayor volumen y su pequeño capital de trabajo no es suficiente para satisfacerla, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará en mayor volumen pollo, huevos, y agregará contramuslo y pechuga principalmente, pues en la actualidad tienen mucha rotación. Su sueño es tener su propio local y ella está dirigiendo todos sus esfuerzos a ese propósito, mientras esto ocurre, es incansable en su trabajo y planea que sus ventas se incrementen en un 30%  y para ella y su familia, estos son nuevos ingresos
texts.en:
Miladis, 47, owns a business called “Distribuidora Miller” where she sells chicken, chicken breasts, eggs, thighs, ham, mortadela and sausage.  

Miladis lives in Soledad with her spouse and three children whose ages range from 13 to 25.  She started the business in 2009 because as an employee finding work was difficult and she felt the need to help meet household expenses which up to that point were totally her spouse’s responsibility.

Before starting her business, Miladis asked around among her neighbors and discovered that selling whole chicken and chicken pieces would be a good option so she invested her small capital and started it at home.  It was so well received that she went on to rent a locale.  From this, she later on added egg and cured meats sales and this is how she is still to this day.

Her sales are cash based but her growing and demanding clientele request more and more each day and her small working capital is insufficient to satisfy them.  This is why she’s calling on a Kiva loan, the first financing she’s gotten from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy larger amounts of chicken and eggs adding thighs and breasts primarily because they are currently having much turnover.  

Her dream is to own a locale and she’s aiming all her efforts toward that end.  While this occurs, she is tireless in her work and plans to increase sales by 30% which represents new income for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy larger amounts of chicken and eggs adding breasts and thighs in particular.

loans.name: Banco Comunal La Esperanza Group

texts.es: La Señora Kenia Lizett es la presidenta del banco comunal la Esperanza. Reyna Del Socorro, Candelaria, Bernabela, Tomasa Antonia, Audelia, Silvia Elena, Azucena, Santos Ramona, Yadira Del Socorro, Normalina y Rosa tiene diferentes actividades económicas.  Lizett se dedica a la venta de raspados y sopas. Hace más de 1 años que tiene este medio de vida, que con tanto esfuerzo ha obtenido. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de leche para la elaboración de sus raspados, hielo entre otros.
texts.en: Kenia Lizett is the president of the communal bank "La Esperanza."  The members Reyna Del Socorro, Candelaria, Bernabela, Tomasa Antonia, Audelia, Silvia Elena, Azucena, Santos Ramona, Yadira Del Socorro, Normalina and Rosa all have different economic activities.  Lizett has a business selling shaved ice and soups.  She has had this business for more than a year, and she acquired the business through a lot of effort.  The loan she requests is to buy milk to make her shaved ice, and to buy ice and other products.

loans.use: to buy products to make her shaved ice desserts, including milk, ice and other items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy snacks, foodstuffs and soft-drinks to stock her store.

loans.name: Bernadette

texts.fr:
Veuve, Bernadette a à charge 4 enfants, tous scolarisés. Elle vit dans la maison familiale de son mari et bénéficie de la pension de veuvage. Restauratrice, elle vend à manger aux élèves du Collège de l'Enseignement Général ENTENTE au cours de l'année scolaire. Pendant les vacances, elle vend à manger dans son quartier. Bernadette s'approvisionne en riz et haricots à Tokpa, le marché international du Bénin. Les condiments et autres accessoires sont achetés tous les jours dans le marché le plus proche. Bernadette est à son 8ème prêt à FINADEV. 
En raison de l'augmentation et des exigences de ses clients Bernadette a décidé renouveler son prêt auprès de FINADEV pour satisfaire un grand nombre de sa clientèle. 
Elle envisage tirer de ce crédit des revenus qui pourront l'aider à assurer la survie de ses enfants et à offrir un confort plus agréable à sa famille.
texts.en: Bernadette is a widow who supports four children, who are all in school. She lives in her husband's family home and receives a widow's pension. A restauranteur, she sells food to students at the Collège de l'Enseignement Général ENTENTE (a middle school) during the school year. During vacation time, she sells food in her district. She gets her supplies of rice and bean from Tokpa, the international market of Benin. The condiments and other accessories are purchased each day from the nearest market. She is now on her eighth loan at the micro-finance institution FINADEV. Because of growth and the requirements of her customers, Bernadette decided to renew her loan with FINADEV to satisfy a large number of her customers. From this loan, she envisions making revenues that will help her to ensure her children's survival and to offer nicer conveniences at home for her family.

loans.use: to buy 5 25-kg sacks of rice, 2 sacks of beans, a 25-liter container, and more

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: Sandra, tiene la edad 20 de  años, está soltera y vive con sus padres. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de insumos para la mejora del cafe. Ella cuenta con un terreno sembrado de café y necesita mejorarlo para tener una mejor cosecha. Ella quiere tener su cafetal en buenas condiciones para que genere una buena cosecha y asi lograr una mejor venta de cafe. Ella quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de sus padres y crecer con el proyecto de cafe. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Sandra is 20 years old, single, and lives with her parents.  She plans to take a loan to buy supplies to improve her coffee crops.  She has land planted with coffee, and she needs to improve the land so that she can have a better harvest.  She wants to have her coffee crops in good condition so that they will generate a good harvest and so that she can have more coffee to sell.  She wants to generate more earnings for her own well-being and for that of her parents, and to expand her coffee business.  This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not had prior loans from the state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her with a loan with better terms and an interest rate that is much lower than that offered by the banks.

loans.use: with her coffee crops

loans.name: Pedro Pascual

texts.es:
Pedro de 41 años de edad y vive en la Ciudadela 20 de Julio, barrio que combina espacios productivos formales e informales, zonas comerciales, edificios, conjuntos residenciales, viviendas, supermercados, y principalmente es un lugar conocido en toda Colombia , porque muy cerca se encuentra uno de los escenario más importante de la ciudad y de Colombia: “El estadio Metropolitano de Barranquilla” donde se juega el buen futbol profesional y es la sede del Junior de Barranquilla y hoy del mundial de futbol de la categoría Sub-20. 
Pedro es un confeccionista de todo tipo de ropas, que inició en el año 2001 su negocio, aunque su experiencia en esta tarea data desde el año 1995. Su taller está ubicado en su propia residencia, que es el apartamento de su madre. El trabaja en su maquina 8 horas diarias, de lunes a sábado y aunque tiene mucha competencia, su experiencia es su máxima fortaleza, y como buen cristiano es apoyado por la iglesia donde se congrega, y es ahí donde encuentra sus mejores clientes, a quienes ofrece plazos cómodos y adaptados a  las necesidades de su mercado. Otorga  plazos que oscilan entre los 7 y 30 días y tambien tien otros ingreos porque fabrica bolsos y zapatos,  según la época del año.
Su sueño es tener un almacén donde venda sus propios diseños y donde logre un más amplio posicionamiento en el mercado. Su gran desafío es su capital de trabajo que para la creciente clientela se torna insuficiente y él quiere complacerla y con ello aumentar sus ingresos; Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, para inyectarle capital de trabajo a su negocio, con este su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, comprará telas por rollos, e insumos para fortalecer su negocio de confecciones e iniciar el cumplimiento de sus sueño; mientras esto ocurra  Pedro maneja  en su negocio una liquidéz de 4 veces y una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 33%.
texts.en:
Pedro, 41, lives in Ciudadela 20 de Julio, a neighborhood that combines formal and informal productive spaces, commercial zones, buildings, residential complexes, housing, supermarkets and primarily is a place renowned throughout Colombia because very near it is found one of the city’s and Colombia’s most important sports venue: The Barranquilla Metropolitan Stadium, where good professional soccer is played and where Barranquilla’s “Junior” team is based and where today World Sub-20 Soccer is based.

Pedro makes all kinds of clothing, a business he started in 2001 although is experience in this line of work dates back to 1995.  His workshop is located in his home which is his mother’s apartment.  He works at his machines 8 hours a day from Monday through Saturday and, although he has much competition, his experience is his greatest asset and as a good Christian he is supported by the church he attends which is also where he finds his best customers to whom he offers easy payment plans that are adapted to the market’s needs.  He offers payment plans that oscillate between 7 and 30 days.  He earns additional income because he also manufactures purses and shoes according to the season.

His dream is to have a store where he can sell his own creations and where he can attain better market positioning.  His great challenge is working capital which is insufficient for his growing clientele that he wants to satisfy and thereby increase income.  This is the reason behind his call upon a Kiva loan to inject capital into his business.  He will use this initial financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy bolts of fabric and supplies to strengthen his clothes making business and start to make his dreams a reality.  While this occurs, Pedro sustains a four-fold liquidity and a profit margin of no less than 33%.

loans.use: to buy bolts of fabric and supplies.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.ru:
Владимир женат. Его супругу зовут Яна. У них две маленькие дочки.

Владимир работает в нескольких направлениях - торгует бытовой техникой, а также устанавливает спутниковые антенны. Владимир трудолюбивый и хозяйственный. Он хочет развивать дальше бизнес в сфере бытовой техники. Мечта Владимира – открыть свой магазин бытовой техники. При этом он объективно оценивает свои силы, понимая, что нужно еще много работать.

Владимир просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 15,000 гривен для закупки партии товара: спутниковые антенны и бытовая техника. Летом идет большой спрос и он, получив дополнительные средства, сможет получить  хорошую прибыль.
texts.en:
Vladimir is married. His wife's name is Yana. They have two little daughters. 

Vladimir works several jobs: selling home appliances and setting up satellite dishes. Vladimir is industrious and economic. He wants to further develop his household appliance business. Vladimir's dream is to open a hardware store. In this case, he has objectively assessed his own strength and realized that he still has a lot of work to do. 

Vladimir requested a loan for 15,000 hryvnia to buy a shipment of satellite dishes and home appliances. In the summer there is a big demand for these things, and if he receives additional funds, he will make a good profit.

loans.use: to buy a shipment of satellite dishes and home appliances

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: Marcelino, tiene la edad 42 de  años, está casado y vive con esposa e hijo. El pretende con el crédito realizar la asistencia de su plantación de café. El cuenta con un lote sembrado de café y pretende invertir en insumos como abonos y fungicidas para obtener una mejor cosecha. El quiere implantar un cafetal que genere una gran producción para vender un café de calidad. El quiere generar  ganancias para su bienestar  y la de sus familia y crecer con el proyecto del café. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marcelino, 42, is married living with his wife and son.  He intends to use the loan for coffee crop maintenance.  He has a lot planted with coffee and he intends to invest in supplies like manure and fungicide to obtain a better harvest.  He wants to install a coffee plantation that produces a large harvest to sell quality coffee.  He wants to generate profits for his and his family’s wellbeing and to grow with his coffee project.

This is his first Fudecosur loan. He’s had no previous loans from state banks.  Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy manure and fungicide.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a loom and yarn to weave.

loans.name: Ivania Regina

texts.es: La señora Ivania Regina, vive en el departamento del sauce, tiene 3 hijos es madre soltera y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Posee un negocio que es una pulpería donde comercializa productos de primera necesidad. La señora es muy conocida en su comarca por lo que ya ha formado una gran cantidad de clientes. Ella se considera una persona muy trabajadora, ella lucha por generar más ingresos, para que de esa forma pueda solventar los gastos de la casa. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, comestibles, lácteos y granos básicos para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en: Ivania Regina lives in Sauce Department.  She has three children and is a single mother with a strong desire to get ahead.  She has a grocery store where she sells basic need items.  She is very well known in her area so has acquired a good number of customers.  She considers herself to be a very hard working person who strives to generate more income so that she can cover household expenses.  She’s asking for the loan to buy beverages, foodstuffs, dairy products and basic grains to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru:
Тамара живет в небольшом городе. Она имеет свой бизнес - продает снасти для рыболовов  и охотников на центральном рынке города.  Тамара выбрала именно это направление, так как сама любит рыбалку. Торговая точка расположена очень удобно и это влияет на рост бизнеса. Тамара открыта и дружелюбна, всегда готова помочь клиенту сделать правильный выбор. 

Тамара просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме  20,000 гривен на приобретение снастей для рыболовов. Тамара планирует расширять свой бизнес и открыть новую торговую точку в ближайшем будущем.
texts.en:
Tamara lives in a small town. She has her own business selling gear for anglers and hunters in the town's central market. Tamara chose this job because she likes to go fishing. This shop is in a very convenient place which helps her business grow.  Tamara is open and friendly, always willing to help a customer make the right choice. 

Tamara is asking for a loan for 20,000 hryvnia to purchase fishing gear. Tamara plans to expand her business and open a new shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fishing gear

loans.name: Luz Lourdes

texts.es:
Doña luz de Lourdes, tiene una pulperia y venta de cosmeticos, que ha venido trabajando para el apoyo de la familia. comenzando con dinero y propio y hoy en dia con prestamos en Afodenic que le ha ayudado al aumento de  la inversion.
Luz tiene mucho proyecto futuro en la mejora a su vivienda, una de ella es la puesta del piso. Pero que en estos momentos no es de periodad, ya que lo que desea es aumentar de productos su negocio, para seguir teniendo la demanda de sus clientes.
Comprara granos basicos,  en quintal de arroz, maiz, frijoles, caja de jabon, bidon de aceite, ropa para niños y cosmeticos de la Avon, zermat, para seguir promoviendo sus ventas.
texts.en:
Luz de Lourdes has a grocery store and cosmetics sales that she’s been running to support her family.  She started out with her own money and today with Afodenic loans that have helped her increase the investment.

Luz plans in the future to do some home improvements, one of which is to install new flooring.  But right now that’s not a high priority because what she wants to do is increase stock inventory in her business to continue being in her customers’ demand.  She will buy basic grains by the quintal: rice and beans, a case of soap, a large jug of oil, children’s clothes and Avon and Zermat brand cosmetics to continue taking advantage of their sales.

loans.use: to buy basic grains and Avon and Zermat brand cosmetics as well as children's clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric for shirts.

loans.name: Maria Ofelia

texts.es: Maria Ofelia tiene 55 años, vive con su esposo y tiene 2 hijos, menores de edad a su cargo. Maria se dedica a la venta y destace de cerdo, actividad que realiza en su vivienda. Actividad que realiza desde hace mas de 7 años, ella cuenta con clientes ya establecidos en la zona y con experiencia en este rubro. Esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, de esta manera pueda tener mejores ingresos para su hogar y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Ofelia, 55, lives with her husband and has two minor children in her care.  María butchers pigs and sells pork, an activity she carries out at home.  She's been in business over 7 years and has an established clientele in the area and experience in this line of work.  She's asking for a loan to buy pigs so that she can have better household income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric to make t-shirts.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: La señora María es cliente de la institución desde el 2006 antes trabajaba con el grupo solidario Fuego pero el grupo se  separo y ella continuo con nosotros en forma individual pagando puntualmente sus cuotas,  ella vive en la zona  de Chasquipampa a una cuadra de la agencia tiene tres hijos,  ella junto a su marido se dedican a la elaboración de pan desde hace varios años,  gracias a su actividad ellos están saliendo adelante el préstamo que están solicitando es para la compra de harina y manteca para la elaboración del pan, son una familia muy unida agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
María has been a client of this institution since 2006. Previously, she worked with the "Fuego" solidarity group, but that group broke up, and she continued with us on an individual basis, paying her instalments promptly. She lives in the Chasquipampa area, a block from our office. 

She has three children. She and her husband have been baking bread for several years. Thanks to their hard work they are getting ahead in life. They are applying for the loan in order to buy flour and shortening.  They are a very close-knit family, and are thankful for the help that the institution offers them.

loans.use:
COMPRA DE HARINA Y MANTECA	
To buy flour and shortening

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: la señora Andrea es cliente de la institución desde hace varios años la señora Andrea tiene su casita en la zona de Ovejuyo vive con sus hijo menor al cual le ayuda con los gastos del hogar, y juntos salen adelante él es conductor asalariado su hijo tiene 18 años y por el trabajo no pudo terminar de estudiar la secundaria por ayudar a su mama, pero el próximo año piensa terminar sus estudios la Sra. Andrea es una mujer muy trabajadora vende fruta en una calle de la zona sud en plena esquina pero es muy conocida por la zona el crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de fruta de temporada.
texts.en:
Andrea has been a client of the institution for some years.  She has a little house in the Ovejuyo area where she lives with her youngest son who helps her with household expenses and together, they are getting ahead.  He is 18 and has a regular job as a driver.  He couldn’t finish secondary school because he needed to help his mother but next year he hopes to finish his studies.  

Andrea is a hard-working woman.  She sells fruit on a corner street in the southern area and she is well known there.  She will use the loan to buy seasonal fruit.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia, tiene la edad 58 de  años, está casada y vive con su esposo. Ella con el crédito va comprar materiales para la confección de ropa. Ella cuenta con la experiencia como costurera desde hace varios años, ella cuenta con varios clientes  que le encargan trabajos y quiere brindarles a ellos un mejor servicio y  acabados de buena calidad. Ella también quiere generar más clientela para así obtener mayores ganancias de su proyecto de costura. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Virginia is 58 years old, married, and lives with her husband.  With the loan she is going to buy materials for making clothing.  She has several years experience as a seamstress. She has several customers who commission work from her. She wants to serve them better and do good quality finished work. She also wants to generate more clientele so as to make more profits from her sewing.  

This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR.  She had not had other loans from state-owned banks, and FUDECOSUR has offered her a loan more easily, and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy fabric and materials

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
Doña Juana se dedica a la venta de tortilla, y cosa de hornos con mas de cinco años, trabajando para el bien comun de la familia, su esposo labora como operario, y sus hijos cursan la primaria.
Juana ha venido mejorando su casa con prestamo en Afodenic, el cual ha sido de gran sastifaccion ya que ha avanzado bastante poco a poco en tres ciclos. en la construccion de un cuarto, aumento su porche y sigue mejorando.
Con este nuevo prestamo podra hacaer su baño para lograr mejor condicion de higiene como mejor aseo personal. Comprara materiales como: perlines, arena, laminas de zinc, bloques y cemento logrando terminar la obra.
texts.en:
Juana has been selling tortillas and baked goods for five years.  She is working for the common good of her family.  Her husband works as an operator, and her children are in elementary school.  

Juana has been improving her house with loans from Afodenic.  It has been very satisfying because she has, little by little, made good progress in three cycles.  She has built a room, expanded her porch, and she continues to make improvements.

With this new loan she will be able to construct a bathroom in order to obtain improved hygienic conditions and better personal care.

She will buy materials like crossbeams, sand, zinc metal sheeting, cement blocks, and cement to finish the work.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a bathroom in order to obtain improved hygienic conditions and better personal care.

loans.name: Floriberto

texts.es: Floriberto, tiene la edad 47  de  años, está casado y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa. El va a comprar con el crédito los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno de café en producción  y lo que él quiere es aumentar las cosechas este próximo año. El pretende con esta asistencia darle la ayuda necesaria a su cafetal para así obtener más ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Floriberto, 47, is married and lives with his wife and two sons. He is going to use the loan to buy the agricultural supplies needed to maintain his coffee crop.

He has a plot of land planted with coffee, and what he wants to do is increase his harvests this coming year.  With this assistance he intends to give his coffee crop the help it needs, so that he can generate more profits and give his family a better quality of life.    

This is his first FUDECOSUR loan. He’s had no previous loans from state-owned banks. FUDECOSUR  offered better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To maintain his coffee crop

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El sr. Juan vive en la zona de la villa primero de mayo, desde hace 2 años en casa propia, es soltero y vive con su hermana. El sr. Juan tenia un vehículo el cual lo vendió para abrir un punto de llamadas, internet y recargas. Es su segundo crédito que solicita en la institución. El crédito que esta solicitando es para comprar un PlayStation y el saldo es para terminar de instalar una cabina telefónica ya que su internet esta ubicado a una cuadra de la plaza principal de la zona donde el vive y en ese lugar hay mucho movimiento de gente. El sr. Juan ha puesto su punto internet porque el ha estudiado mantenimiento, reparación de computadoras e instalación de redes, tiene mucha experiencia y muchas ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Señor Juan lives in the Primero de Mayo village.  For the last two years he has lived in his own home.  He is single and lives with his sister.  Señor Juan had a car which he sold to open a location for phone calls, Internet access and device charging.  

This is his second loan that he has requested through the institution. The loan he is applying for is to buy a PlayStation, and the balance is to finish installing a pay phone as his internet cafe is located one block from the main square of the area where he lives, and there are many passersby. 

Señor Juan started his internet cafe because he studied maintenance, computer repair and network installation.  He is very experienced and eager to move ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy a PlayStation and with the balance, to finish installation of a pay phone.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco, tiene la edad 39 de  años, está casado y vive con sus 4 hijos y su esposa. El va a comprar con el crédito los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con varios años de experiencia en el manejo de este cultivo y lo que él pretende es darle una mejora y ayuda extra para así aumentar este próximo año la cosecha de café. El con esta mejora tiene como meta generar las ganancias para salir adelante con el crédito, crecer con el proyecto y darle a su familia una calidad de vida mejor. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Fransisco is 39, and lives with his wife and 4 children.  He is going to use the loan to buy the supplies necessary to maintain his coffee crop. He has several years of experience growing coffee.  

He intends make improvements and give his crop extra help, in order to increase his coffee harvest in the coming year. With the loan and these improvements, his goal is to generate more profit and grow as a coffee producer, so that he can get ahead, and provide his family with a better quality of life.

He hadn't had previous loans from state-owned banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him better terms, and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To maintain his coffee crop

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos, tiene la edad 32 de  años, está en unión libre y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son sus prioridades. El va a comprar con el crédito los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con  una plantación de café ya establecida en buenas condiciones y lo quiere mejorar en condiciones de cosecha. El  con esta mejorar lo que quiere es obtener mejores ganancias para su bienestar y seguir adelante con sus proyecto de vida. También poderle dar a su familia cada día el sustento diario. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Carlos is 32, and and is in a common-law relationship.  He lives with his wife and son, who are his priority. He is going to use the loan to buy the necessary supplies to maintain his coffee crop. He has a coffee plantation that is already well-established, and he wants to improve his harvest. 

With these improvements he wants to earn better profits, for his well-being and to get ahead in life.  He also wants to meet his family's daily needs. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hadn't had previous loans from state-owned banks, but FUDECOSUR offered better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To maintain his coffee crop.

loans.name: Agua De Peumo Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Agua de Peumo” está conformado por 17 emprendedores que se dedican a diferentes rubros principalmente repostería, preparación y venta de ensaladas, venta de ropa para niño y dama. Todo ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Chillán.
María integrante del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra al fondo del grupo, vistiendo una chaqueta color negro y una bufanda color verde, además su cabello lo tiene amarrado. Ella recién comenzó a incursionar en el rubro del comercio y se dedicará a vender juguetes, aprovechará la temporada del día del niño y navidad. Antes se dedicaba a trabajar como temporera en el campo. María tiene buenas expectativas en cuanto a su negocio como desafío. 
Con el crédito comprará juguetes para su negocio, ya realizó un listado con los juguetes de moda. 
Sus metas en su negocio son prosperar y establecerse con un local en una feria libre. 
María vive junto a su marido y sus tres hijos. Todos ellos están estudiando en diferentes niveles. Sus sueños son brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Ella quiere acceder a su casa propia, para esto postulará al subsidio habitacional.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito obtenido por Fondo Esperanza, ya que con éste podrá invertir y generar mayores ganancias para concretar sus proyectos. Además se siente muy cómoda con el grupo del banco comunal, ya que ha aprendido de experiencias de los demás socios y ha sentido el compromiso de ellos.  
Chillán es una comuna de la zona centro sur de Chile. Su nombre significa “silla del sol” en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches. Chillán es conocida como “Cuna de la Patria” o “Tierra de Artistas”, debido a que en la ciudad han nacido destacados personajes de la historia de Chile, como por ejemplo el conocido pianista Claudio Arrau.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Agua de Peumo.” It is made up of 17 entrepreneurs who work in different fields, chiefly making desserts; preparing and selling salads; and selling women's and children's clothing. All of them are residents of the city of Chillán.

María is a member of the communal bank; in the photo, she is in the back of the group, wearing a black jacket and a green scarf and with her hair tied back. She recently entered the field of commerce, and she is going to sell toys, taking advantage of the Children's Day and Christmas seasons. She previously worked as a temporary farm laborer. María has high hopes for meeting the challenge of her business. 

With the loan, she will buy toys for her business. She has already prepared a list of popular toys. 

Her goals for her business are to prosper and to establish herself with a stand in an open-air market. 

María lives with her husband and her three children. All of the children are studying at various levels. Her dreams are to provide a better quality of life for her family. She wants to obtain her own house, and for this purpose she is going to apply for a housing subsidy. 

She is very happy and grateful about the loan obtained from the Fondo Esperanza ["Hope Fund"], since it will allow her to invest and generate better earnings to achieve her goals. Additionally, she feels very comfortable with the group in her communal bank, since she has learned from the experiences of the other members and has felt how committed they are.

Chillán is a township in the central-southern zone of Chile. Its name means "seat of the sun" in Mapudungun, the language of the indigenous Mapuche people. Chillán is known as the "Cradle of the Country" or the "Land of Artists," since distinguished personalities in Chile's history have been born there, such as the well-known pianist Claudio Arrau.

loans.use: to buy toys to sell.

loans.name: Abdon

texts.es: Abdón, tiene la edad 46 de  años, está casado y vive su esposa que es su  prioridad. El con el crédito va a comprar los insumos necesarios de la siembra de tomate y chile. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de estos cultivos por lo cual los sembrara y los asistirá para su cosecha. El quiere generar  las ganancias para salir con el crédito y cumplir con sus proyectos de vida. Quiere darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida en el futuro.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Abdón is 46, and married. He lives with his wife, who is his priority. With the loan, he is going to buy the supplies necessary to grow tomatoes and chiles. 

He has a plot of land suitable for growing these crops, so he will plant them, and help them be ready for harvest. He wants to generate profits in order to pay off the loan and to fulfil his goals in life. He wants to give his family a better quality of life in the future. 

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hadn't previously taken loans from state-owned banks, but FUDECOSUR offered better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To grow tomatoes and chiles.

loans.name: Lucio

texts.es: El señor Lucio nació en la ciudad de La Paz, casado con la Sra. Rosario y tienen un hijo ya joven que se encuentra en la universidad, su domicilio es propio ubicado en la zona la Guardia,  es Artesano y vende artesanías en la frontera con el Brasil (corumba), hace unos treinta años se dedica a esta labor, el destino del crédito es para la compra de una moto para su hijo Adrián quien necesita para movilizarse a la universidad y así poder ahorra dinero en pasajes, se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Lucio was born in the city of La Paz.  He is married to Rosario, and they have a son who is studying at the university.  He lives in his own home, located in the La Guardia neighborhood.  He is a craftsman, and he sells handicrafts at the Brazilian border (in Corumba.)  He has been doing this work for 30 years.  He will use this loan to buy a motorcycle for his son Adrian, who needs it to get to the university, and in this way can save the money he spends on bus tickets.  Lucio is grateful to the institution for the support that they have provided him.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Edixon Elias

texts.es:
Edixon de profesion mecanico automatriz, tiene su pequeño taller en su casa de habitacion, casado, y padre de dos hijos.
Don Edixon hara mejora a su casa, en la construccion de un  muro lateral, lo que vendra adar mejores condiciones de seguridad, en donde ira poco a poco hasta que cierre todo y espera lograrlo atravez de los financiamiento de Afodenic, siendo su quinto ciclo. 
Materiales a comprar: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, tablas, clavos y comenzar la obra.
En su negocio le va bien, y espera crecer y captar clientes para seguir laborando dia a dia para el bienestar comun de la familia.
texts.en:
Edixon is an auto mechanic by profession, and has a small workshop in his house. He is married and the father of two children. 

Edixon will make improvements to his house by constructing a side wall which will provide better security.  He will build it gradually until he encloses everything.  He hopes to achieve this with financing from AFODENIC, this being his fifth loan-cycle.  Materials to buy include: stone, sand, cement, iron, boards, nails...and then he can start construction. 

He's doing well in his business. He hopes to grow and attract customers, in order to keep working day to day for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to build a side wall for his house, to improve security.

loans.name: Sara Pastoriza

texts.es:
Sara Pastoriza tiene 57 años de edad, es casada vive con su esposo e hijos de 38, 36, 33,30, 26, 24, 22 años, en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C PATRON SAN JUAN , se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad San Juan, sector Llullundondo, parroquia Guanujo, a una distancia de 25 minutos  perteneciente al cantón Guaranda, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

Sara Pastoriza se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, tiene casa propia, 2 cuadras de terreno, siembra papas, maíz trigo, además cría otras especies de animales como cerdos, ovejas pollos y cuyes. Compra y vende sus productos en la ciudad de Guaranda

Solicita el crédito para, compra de abonos, semillas y para sembrar papas. El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos el incremento y caída de precios de los productos que comercializa, así como los bruscos cambios climáticos por los que estamos atravesando. Su sueño es ampliar su producción, tener una vida tranquila con salud y sacar a sus hijos adelante. 

Le gusta las festividades del carnaval y del patrón San Juan, realizar actividades como pasear con la familia.
texts.en:
Sara Pastoriza, 57, is married and lives with her husband and their children aged 38, 36, 33,30 26, 24, and 22 in Guaranda canton in Bolivar province.


The members of the rural communal bank "Patron San Juan" live in the community of San Juan de Llullundondo in Guanujo parish, 25 minutes from Guaranda.  The members of this communal bank work in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Sara Pastoriza farms and raises livestock.  She has her own house and 3 hectares of land where she cultivates potatoes, corn and wheat.  In addition she raises animals such as pigs, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs.  She buys and sells her products in the city of Guaranda.

She requests a loan to buy manure and seeds to plant potatoes.  The loan will help her by enabling her to purchase all of the supplies she needs for her agricultural activities.  She encounters challenges such as the rise and fall of the prices of the products she sells, as well as the abrupt climate changes we are experiencing.  Her dream is to increase her production and to have a tranquil and healthy life in which her children can get ahead. 

She enjoys the carnival and the patron saint San Juan festivities, and doing things like going on walks with her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Jacqueline Roxana

texts.es: La Sra. Jacqueline,  tiene como actividad la venta de regalos y vajilla,  actividad que realiza durante la semana  preparando y empaquetando sus regalos para su posterior venta, La mencionada actividad es su principal fuente de ingreso para ella y su familia, el esposo trabaja  en el rubro de la construcción, juntos trabajan por el bienestar de su familia puesto que tienen 3 hijos, el destino del crédito es para la compra de mercadería y la compra de una batería electrónica para su esposo quien en su tiempo libre se dedica a la música, de esta actividad tambien tiene un ingreso extra que ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Es una persona muy trabajadora y se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Jacqueline sells gifts and tableware. She does this during the week, preparing the gifts to be sold. This activity is the main source of income for her her and her family. Her husband works in construction. Together they work for their family's wellbeing, since they have 3 children. The loan will be used to buy merchandise and an electric drum set for her husband, who is a musician in his free time. He also makes extra income with this activity to help with household expenses. She is a very hardworking woman and is grateful for the support that has been offered.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es: Teresa es una mujer separada, madre D. 5 hijos D. los cuales solo 2 viven con ella. Ellos son mayores D. edad y D. alguna manera aportan a la canasta familiar. Teresa vive en el distrito D. Calleria, en la ciudad D.
