Para Catherine el negocio de la venta de comida es una actividad que le ayuda a poder tener sus ingresos para poder dar una buena educación a sus hijos, ella realiza esta actividad en la casa de su madre y lleva ya mas de dos años en este negocio, se siente cómoda trabajando ahí pues ella tiene tiempo para poder realizar otras actividades además de tener tiempo para estar a lado de sus hijos y su madre.Lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es que puede tener tiempo libre por las tardes para así poder realizar otras actividades porque es una mujer proactiva.  Lo que no le gusta es que a veces tiene que dar crédito a algunos comensales y estos se  demoran en pagarle, pero siempre con buen ánimo terminan ella termina recibiendo su dinero. Su negocio está cerca de una empresa grande de la ciudad por lo cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes y por lo mismo muy buenos ingresos diarios. Ella esta empezando a remodelar su local pues así espera dar crecimiento de sus actividades.Para Catherine este es el primer préstamo con la institución MFP, espera que le vaya bien ya que tiene mucha esperanza de seguir trabajando con el grupo que integra ya que hasta ahora todos se portaron bien con ella y se siente cómoda.Con los 1000 soles que solicito comprará calaminas, maderas y otros materiales para poder continuar con la remodelación de su negocio.
texts.en: Catherine is 32 years old and is a happy woman who wants to get ahead in life.  She is a single mother of two children who are her biggest reason to get ahead.  She lives at her mother’s house and hopes to soon be able to improve the quality of life for herself and her children.  For Catherine, the food sales business helps her to be able to earn income to provide her children with a good education.  She works from her mother’s house and has been in this business for over two years now.  She is comfortable working there, as she has time to do other things in addition to having time to be with her children and her mother.  What she likes most about her business is being able to have free time in the afternoons so that she can do other things, as she is a proactive woman.  What she does not like is that she sometimes has to loan money to some diners who take a long time to repay her.  However, she is always in good spirits and she receives her money in the end.  Her business is located near a large company in the city, which is why she has a large number of customers and thus, good daily earnings.  She is starting to remodel her place of business in hopes of increasing business.  This is Catherine’s first loan with MFP and she hopes that it goes well, as she has high hopes of continuing to work with the same group of borrowers.  So far, everyone has treated her well and she feels comfortable.  With the 1,000 Peruvian Nuevos Soles (PEN) requested, she will purchase corrugated iron, wood and other materials to continue remodeling her business.

loans.use: to buy corrugated iron, wood and other materials to continue remodeling her business.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: Dionicio (41 años) es un hombre trabajador y responsable, vive en casa propia junto a su pareja y sus dos hijos por quienes sale todos los días a trabajar para brindarles una mejor educación y sobre todo una mejor calidad de vida.Dionicio tiene como rutina del trabajo que realiza salir muy temprano a las calles en busca de los pasajeros eventuales que están en busca de transportarse de un lugar a otro, lleva con esta actividad ya casi dos años, además de trabajar en su mototaxi, el tiene una bodega en su casa y es su esposa quien se encarga de este negocio.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene contacto directo con las personas, hace buenas relaciones y sobre todo que siempre encuentra pasajeros queriendo ir de un lugar a otro.Lo que no le gusta es tener que estar en el sol arduo de la ciudad pero entiende que es la manera que el optó para ganarse la vida y espera poder seguir trabajando así para poder mejor la calidad de vida de su familia.Este es el tercer prestamos de Dionicio y se siente bien y tranquilo aun que el grupo atravesó algunos problemas el sabe que siempre se tienen entre ellos para apoyarse.Con el préstamo solicitado el comprará algunos repuestos para su mototaxi ya que por lo años y el mal estado de las pistas tiene que ser modificados y cambiados muy a menudo.
texts.en: Dionicio (41) is a responsible, hard-working man.  He lives in a house that he owns with his wife and their two children, children for whom he works hard to provide a good education and a better quality of life.  Dionicio starts his days very early, on the lookout for passengers for his taxi business.  He's operated the business for almost two years now.  Along with his taxi business, Dionicio has a corner shop that he opened in a spare room of his house, a business managed by his wife.  The thing that he likes best about working is contact with other people.  He connects well with people and he likes finding new passengers and taking them where they have to go.  What he likes least about working is the sun on a hot day, but he knows it's a price that he has to pay to make a living and support his family.  This is Dionicio's third loan and he's happy that his community group has overcome some recent problems.  He knows that they will always support each other in the end.  He will use the loan to buy some spare parts for his mototaxi.  The mototaxi needs constant care because it's old and suffers from the poor state of local streets.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his taxi business.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María, de 47 años es una mujer alegre y con muchas ganas de vivir, vive con su pareja en su casa que pudo comprar junto a el, además vive con sus tres hijos a quienes brinda buena educación y son su razón de vivir.
El trabajo de María inicia muy temprano cuando sale en busca de las frutas mas frescas y agradables de la región, ella se dirige al mercado de frutas ubicado por el centro de la ciudad en donde va en busca de sus proveedores quienes le dan la mejor calidad, después vuelve a su casa pues los clientes están en espera para los desayunos de los niños que van al colegio, esta actividad realiza en su casa y cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos además que su esposo trabaja como transportista y juntos generan buenos ingresos a su hogar.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene la ayuda de sus hijos y de su esposo además de poder realizar esta actividad por las mañana y tener libre por las tardes, espera poder agrandar su negocio pues tiene todas las ganas y el deseo de poder superar sus mismas expectativas.Este es el primer préstamo que le otorga MFP a María y espera poder cumplir con todos las expectativas formadas ya que no le gusta deber y siempre fue muy responsable con todo.Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, ella comprará mas frutas, además de bebidas ya que piensa iniciar en este rubro también.
texts.en:
María, 47, is a happy woman who loves life.  She lives with her partner in their home that they bought together.  They also live with their three children who they are providing a good education and who are her reason for living.

María's work starts very early when she goes out to find the freshest and best fruits in the region.  She goes to the fruit market located in the center of the city where she looks for suppliers who have the best quality.  Then she returns home because her customers are waiting and she makes breakfast for her children who go to high school.  She does this work at home and her children help her.  Her husband works in transportation and together they earn a good income for their family.

The thing she likes best about her work is that her children and her husband help her, and she is able to do her work in the morning and have the afternoons free.  She hopes to expand her business since she has the drive and the desire to exceed her own expectations.  This is her first loan with MFP and she hopes to meet all of the expectations since she does not like to be in debt and she has always been very responsible.  With the 1000 soles she has requested, she will purchase more fruit and drinks, since she wants to expand into that area as well.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit and expand into selling drinks.

loans.name: Martha Luz

texts.es: Martha Luz, de 54 años es una mujer trabajadora y muy emprendedora, esta casada y viven en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos por quienes cada día se esfuerza para darles lo mejor en educación y calidad de vida.Martha tiene como actividad la venta de abarrotes en general, además de bebidas heladas y una productora de cigarros mapacho (un tipo de cigarro regional). Ella lleva 4 años con su bodega y  cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos y su esposo con quienes se siente feliz de poder compartir un negocio que beneficia a todos.Lo que le gusta a Martha de su negocio es que dispone de su tiempo para poder hacer otras actividades. Este negocio le genera buenas ganancias ya que siempre hay clientes interesados en su producto y vende al por mayor a los minoristas que tiene como clientes.Este es el décimo préstamo de Martha con MFP pues es socia muy antigua ya que lleva casi cinco años en el grupo en donde es conocida como una mujer responsable y paciente.Con los 2000 soles solicitados ella comprará productos para su bodega, entre ellos abarrotes y bebidas para su posterior venta.
texts.en:
Martha Luz, age 54, is a hard-working and very enterprising woman.  She is married, and she lives in her own house with her two children.  She puts forth effort every day in order to give her children the best education and the best quality of life.

Martha sells general groceries.  She also sells cold drinks and “Mapacho” cigarettes (a type of regional cigarette).  She has had her store for four years, and her children and her husband help her.  She is happy to be able to share the business, which benefits all of them.

What Martha likes about the business is that she arranges her time to be able to do other activities.  This business generates good income for her because there are always customers interested in her products.  She sells wholesale to the retailers who are her customers.

This is Martha’s tenth loan with MFP.  She has been a member for a very long time.  She has been in the group for almost five years.  She is known in her group for being a responsible and patient woman.  She will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy products for her store.  Among the things she will buy are groceries and drinks that she will sell later.

loans.use: to buy products like groceries and drinks to sell at her store.

loans.name: Julian

texts.en:
This is 27-year-old businesswoman Julian, a married mother of two children aged 13 and 6 years. She also has two additional dependents living with her because she wants to assist them with their education.

In 2003, Julian established her slippers and sandals business in order to become productive in the home. Working seven days a week and eight hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month. Now requesting a loan of Le 3,000,000 to buy more plastic slippers and sandals, she hopes the loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000.

In the future, Julian plans to build a store to help her husband educate their children to university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more plastic silppers and sandals for her business.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 39-year-old Fatmata, a married mother of two children aged 14 and 16 years. In 2009, she established her hair product and beauty salon business in order to become self-reliant and because she had prior experience in hair dressing. Working 6 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,100,000 every month.

Now requesting a loan of Le 3,000,000 to buy more hairdressing materials to improve her business, Fatmata hopes the loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 225,000. In the future, she plans to build a big salon and educate her children to university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more hair products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
This is 41-year-old Francis. He is married and has 2 children, ages 12 and 18. He has 4 additional dependents who live with him because their parents were unable to provide an education for them.

In 1991, Francis established his European games and sports center business. He began his business because his salary was not sufficient for him and his family. Working 4 days a week and 5 hours a day, he earns about 1,000,000 SLL every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Francis requires a loan in order to improve on his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 250,000 SLL. 

In the future, Francis plans to build a shop and give adequate support to his children for their education. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy modern television sets and pay his annual subscription fees

loans.name: Jestina

texts.en:
This is 35-year-old Jestina. She is married and has 4 children, ages 15, 12, 6, and 3 years old. 

In 2005, she established her food sales business. She sales items such as palm oil, Garie, foofoo, and pineapples. She began her business because she dropped out of school and needed to engage herself to avoid being idle at home. Working 6 days a week and 6 hours a day, she earns about 900,000 SLL every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Jestina requires a loan in order to buy more local food stuffs for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 250,000 SLL. 

In the future, Jestina plans to have a store on her own and support her children through their university education. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more local food items for her business

loans.name: Wilfred

texts.en:
This is 41-year-old Wilfred. He is married and has 4 children, ages 19, 14, 12 and 6 years old. He has 3 additional dependents who live with him because their parents were unable to provide for them. 

In 2001, Wilfred established his firewood and charcoal business. He began his business because his salary was not sufficient for him and his family. Working 4 days a week and 5 hours a day, he earns about 900,000 SLL every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. Wilfred requires a loan to buy firewood and charcoal for his business. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL. 

In the future, Wilfred plans to build a store and a house for his family. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more firewood and charcoal for his business

loans.name: Haja

texts.en: This is 43-year-old Haja. She is married and has two children, ages 20 and 6. She has one additional dependent who lives with her because she helps her in her business. In 2001, Haja established her business making cooked food. She began her business because she wanted to earn money on her own in order to provide for her family. Working six days a week and seven hours a day, she earns about 900,000 SLL every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL to buy ingredients for cooking. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 200,000 SLL. In the future, she plans to have a big modern restaurant. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for cooking

loans.name: Merdeces

texts.es: Mercedes, tiene 59 años esta casada y vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y dos nietas D. 12 y 17 años,  a quienes les da educación e intenta darles una mejor calidad D. vida.Mercedes tiene como trabajo el D. la venta D. carbón, plátano y bebidas gaseosas, además esta empezando con una actividad diferente y en sociedad con su hijos, ella envía combustible a una zona minera para que su hijo lo venda a los buscadores D. oro artesanal, lleva ya un año en este trabajo.Le gusta este trabajo por que en su casa pueD. vender algunas cosas mientras que por otro lado su hijo también le hace producir su dinero. Mercedes  se ha dado cuenta que es muy rentable pues es la tercera vez que envía y las dos veces anteriores le salio muy bien todo. Ella espera poder comprar muchos mas productos para seguir abasteciendo a su hijo y así puedan seguir creciendo.Este es el cuarto préstamo entre Mercedes y MFP, hasta ahora todo le va bien y espera poder seguir trabajando así ya que le gusta su grupo por que con todos se lleva bien.Con el dinero solicitado 2000 soles comprará carbón, plátano y más combustible para poder enviar a su hijo.
texts.en:
Mercedes, age 59, is married.  She lives in her own house with her husband and her two granddaughters, ages 12 and 17.  She gives them an education, and she tries to give them a better quality of life.

Mercedes works selling charcoal, bananas, and carbonated drinks.  In addition to this she has started a different business activity with her children.  She is sending fuel to a mining zone, and her son sells it to people looking for artisanal gold.  She has been doing this work for one year.

She likes this work because she is able to sell some things at home while her son is also producing money.  Mercedes has realized that it is very profitable.  This is the third time she has sent fuel, and the two previous times everything turned out very well.  She hopes to be able to buy many more products to continue stocking her son.  This way they can continue growing.

This is the fourth loan between Mercedes and MFP.  So far everything is going well for her, and she hopes to be able to continue working this way.  She likes her group because everyone gets along well.

She will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy charcoal, bananas, and more fuel to be able to send to her son.

loans.use: to buy charcoal, bananas, and more fuel for her business.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz, de 61 años es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en casa propia junto a uno de sus dos hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad. Es separada de su esposo e hizo lo posible para poder salir adelante junto a sus hijos quienes son profesionales y le ayudan.Beatriz se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado.Viaja a otras ciudades  para vender a sus clientes fijos que tiene en Palcazu (ciudad cerca de Pucallpa), lugar que visita muy frecuentemente llevando el pescado seco de la región. Ella tiene muchos clientes, ya que vende el pescado de buena calidad y además mantiene siempre un trato amable con su clientela.Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y bromear entre ellos. Lleva muchos años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es tener que viajar tan lejos para poder hacer sus ventas. Sin embargo, sabe que esto es beneficioso y que todo  lo hace por el bien de su economía y una mejor calidad de vida.Este es el segundo préstamo entre MFP y ella le agrada su grupo por que son muy preocupados entre ellos y siempre son responsables.Con el préstamo solicitado 1500 soles ella comprará mas pescado para así poder ir a vender en sus lugares de destino.
texts.en:
Beatriz, age 61, is a very hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with one of her two children.  The children are adults.  She is separated from her husband, and she has done everything possible to be able to get ahead with her children.  They are professionals, and they help her.

Beatriz buys and sells fish.  She travels to other cities to sell to the regular customers that she has in Palcazu (city near Pucallpa).  She goes there often taking dried fish from the region.  She has a lot of customers because she sells good quality fish, and she always provides her customers with friendly service. 

What she likes most about her work is talking and joking with her customers.  She has been in this business for many years.  She considers having to travel so far to be able to make her sales to be the hardest part.  Nonetheless, she knows that this is beneficial.  Everything she does is for the good of her finances and for a better quality of life.

This is her second loan with MFP.  She is pleased with her group because they are concerned about each other, and they are always responsible.  She will use the requested 1,500 soles to buy more fish to sell at her sales' destinations.

loans.use: to buy more fish to be able to sell at her sales' destinations.

loans.name: Enita

texts.es: El negocio de Enita consiste en la fabricación de cigarros mapachos (cigarro regional que aleja a los malos espíritus). Este negocio lo realiza en su casa cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos, su madre y algunos familiares más a quienes ella les da trabajo en esta pequeña fábrica.Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es poder trabajar junto a sus hijos y familiares pues es una buena manera de estar cerca de ellos y poder compartir cosas, además puede disponer de tiempo para realizar diferentes actividades por las tardes. Enita tiene una gran cartera de clientes y espera poder seguir creciendo con la misma fuerza que lo ha estado haciendo hasta ahora.Este es el tercer préstamo entre Enita y MFP, le agrada mucho el grupo en el que esta ya que es una socia muy querida por todos por su responsabilidad.Con el préstamo solicitado de 2000 soles ella comprará materiales para continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Enita's business is the making of mapacho cigarettes (local cigarette that keeps away evil spirits).  She runs her business from her house with the help of her children, her mother, and some other relatives who work in this small workshop. 

What she most likes about her work is to be able to work alongside her children and relatives, since this is a good way to be close to them and to share things. Also, she has time available to to do other work in the afternoons.

Anita has a long list of customers, and hopes her business will to grow as strongly as it has up to now. 

This is the third loan between Enita and MFP. She really likes the group she is in, and she is a very well liked by all because she is so responsible.

With the loan of 2000 soles she is applying for she will buy materials to continue with her business.

loans.use: To buy materials to continue with her business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
Felipa de 47 años es madre soltera de 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia que pudo comprar gracias al arduo trabajo y esfuerzo que siempre mostró ante las adversidades y dificultades que la vida le puso en frente.La actividad de Felipa consiste en levantarse temprano para ir a realizar las compras necesarias para vender en la bodega que tiene en su casa. Además de esta actividad, Felipa posee dos mototaxis los cuales alquila a algunos conductores. En la bodega que tiene ella recibe el apoyo de sus hijos cuando están libres ya que ellos estudian gracias a lo que  su madre les puede brindar.
Según Felipa, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo libre y puede usarlo para otras cosas a parte de estar en la tienda. Lo que no le gusta es que a veces algunas personas afanosas quieren comprar a crédito algunas cosas pero la experiencia le enseñó que esta forma de trabajar no es buena. Espera poder agrandar su tienda ya que hasta ahora le esta yendo bien y a pesar de los pocos meses que lleva en este negocio.Este es el tercer préstamo entre Felipa y MFP, siempre se llevó bien con los integrantes de su grupo y espera poder seguir así ya que quiere seguir trabajando con ellos por que le demostraron que son muy responsables.Con el préstamo solicitado 1000 soles, ella comprará abarrotes y algunas bebidas para implementar su bodega.
texts.en:
Felipa, age 47, is the single mother of two children.  They live in her own house, which she was able to buy thanks to her arduous work and the effort she always shows facing life’s adversities and difficulties.

Felipa’s business activity consists of getting up early in order to go make the purchases she needs to sell at the general store she has in her house.  In addition to this activity, Felipa has two “mototaxis” (three wheeled motorized vehicles) that she rents to some drivers.  Her children help her in the general store when they are free.  They go to school thanks to what their mother is able to provide for them.

According to Felipa, the thing she likes the most about her work is having free time and being able to use it for other things besides being in the store.  What she does not like is that at times some difficult people want to buy some things on credit.  However, experience has taught her that working this way is no good.  She hopes to be able to expand her store.  It has been going well for her so far, in spite of the few months that she has had this business.

This is Felipa’s third loan with MFP.  She has always gotten along well with the members of her group, and she hopes to be able to continue to do so.  She wants to keep working with them because they have shown her that they are very responsible.

She will use the 1,000 soles that she has requested to buy groceries and some drinks for her general store.

loans.use: to buy groceries and some drinks for her general store.

loans.name: Katherin Susan

texts.es: Katherin, de 23 años es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su madre, su hijo y su tía con quienes comparte su alegría y su deseo de superación.Katherin comienza su día muy temprano cuando sale a realizar sus compras en el mercado para realizar su negocio que consiste en la venta de comida en un restaurante.  Su local es alquilado  pero está ubicado de una avenida transitada de la ciudad lo que es muy beneficioso. Ella es nueva en este negocio, lleva pocos meses realizándolo y agradece tener la ayuda de su madre y su tía quienes la apoyan siempre.Lo que más le agrada de su trabajo es que tiene trato directo con sus clientes y lo que le incomoda es que tiene que salir muy temprano. Sin embargo, Katherin sabe que de esto depende el crecimiento de su negocio por lo que acepta el reto para poder seguir hacia delante y así dar una buena educación a su hijo.Este es el primer préstamo realizado entre Katherin y MFP, se siente cómoda por que sabe que el monto solicitado es poco y con las proyecciones de su negocio podrá pagar todas su cuotas a tiempo.Con lo solicitado 1000 soles ella comprará una cocina industrial y una parrilla ya que desea vender parrillas por las noches.
texts.en: Katherin, age 23, is a very hard-working and enterprising woman. She lives in a rented home with her mother, her child and her aunt, with whom she shares her joy and her desire to succeed. Katherin starts her day very early, when she goes out to make her purchases for her business. She sells food in a restaurant. Her building is rented but it is located in a high-traffic area of the city, which is very beneficial. She is new to this business, and has been in it for a few months. She is grateful to have the help of her mother and aunt, who always support her. Having direct contact with her customers is what she most likes about her job, and her main inconvenience is having to get going very early in the mornings. However, Katherin knows that her business' growth depends on this, and so she accepts the challenge in order to continue moving forward and thus provide a good education for her child. This is the first loan between Katherin and MFP. She feels comfortable because she knows that the amount she has requested is small and that with her business projections she will be able to repay all of her quotas on time. With the requested 1000 soles, she will purchase an industrial kitchen and a grill, because she wants to sell grilled food in the evenings.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial kitchen and a grill because she wants to sell grilled food at night.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: Lourdes es una mujer trabajadora, tiene 67 años es casada y vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y una de sus hijas.La actividad de Lourdes es la venta de comida, lo realiza en la vereda de su casa y cuenta con la ayuda de su hija con quien lleva ya casi 2 años trabajando en este negocio.Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es que puede distraerse al mismo tiempo que genera ingresos, además le gusta mucho estar a lado de su hija quien es su principal soporte en el negocio, lo que no le gusta es tener que cerrar todo y no vender nada cuando hay fuertes lluvias que son muy comunes en la región. La ubicación de su negocio esta en una avenida muy transitada por lo que siempre tiene clientes fijos y algunos viajeros quienes se van encantados por su trato amable y lo cómodo de sus precios. Ella tiene en mente hacer crecer su casa para así no tener que estar guardando todos sus productos cada vez que llueva.Este es el primer préstamo entre Lourdes y MFP, espera poder pagar a tiempo y no fallar a la persona que le recomendó ni mucho menos al grupo que le trato muy bien desde que ingreso.Con los 1000 soles solicitados ella comprará materiales para arreglar la fachada de su casa, entre ellos listones, maderas y calaminas; además ingredientes e insumos para continuar con su negocio.
texts.en: Lourdes is a hardworking women. She is 67 years old, married, and lives in her own house along with her husband and one of her daughters. Lourdes’s business is selling food. She does this in the entrance to her home and she tells us that with the help of her daughter she has been working in this business for almost 2 years. What she likes most about her work is that she can have fun at the same time she is earning an income. Also, she really likes working alongside her daughter, who is her main help in the business. What she doesn’t like is having to close up and not sell anything whenever there is a heavy rain, which is very common in her area. The location of her business is a busy street which is why she always has regular customers and some travelers who are very pleased with her friendly service and comfortable prices. She is planning to expand her house so that she doesn’t have to bring in all of her products every time it rains. This is Lourdes’s first loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She expects to be able to pay on time and not let down the person who recommended her, and much less the group, which has treated her very well since she became a member. With the PEN 1,000.00 she has requested, she will buy materials to expand the front of her house, such as wooden supports, wood, tin roofing, and also ingredients and other inputs for her business.

loans.use: to buy materials to expand the front of her house, such as wooden supports, wood, tin roofing, and also ingredients and other inputs for her business.

loans.name: Mónica Isabel

texts.es: Mónica (28 años) es una mujer valiente y dispuesta a luchar por sus ideales. Es casada y  madre de 3 hermosos niños. Ella trabajó junto a su pareja para comprar un terreno y levantar una casa de madera.El trabajo de Mónica empieza desde muy temprano, yendo al mercado en busca de las mejores verduras y carnes para así poder cocinar los menús que vende en un lugar cerca de su casa. Debido a que hay muchas obras en construcción, los obreros son sus clientes fijos. Ella cuenta con la ayuda de dos personas para este trabajo ya que sola no podría porque preparar comida para mucha gente.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que la gente que tiene como clientes son muy puntuales y respetuosos. Lo que no le agrada es tener que levantarse temprano para ir al mercado ya que cuando su pareja no puede ir con ella, tiene que ir sola y el lugar por donde vive es un poco alejado de la ciudad y peligroso. Sin embargo Mónica sabe que todo riesgo vale la pena porque considera que su actividad es muy rentable.Este es el tercer préstamo de Mónica con la institución MFP y hasta ahora le ha ido bien con todo y espera poder seguir así ya que quiere seguir formando parte del grupo que trabaja con MFP.Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles ella comprará ingredientes e insumos para poder seguir en este trabajo que le gusta mucho.
texts.en: Mónica (28 years old) is a courageous woman who is ready to fight for her ideals. She is married and the mother of 3 beautiful children. She works, along with her husband, so they can buy a piece of land and build a wooden house. Mónica’s work begins very early in the morning, going to the market to choose the best vegetables and meats so that she can cook the meals that she sells in a place near her house. Because there are a lot of jobs in construction, the construction workers are her regular customers. She has two people to help her in her work because she couldn’t prepare food for so many people by herself. What she likes about her job is that the people who are her customers are punctual and respectful. What she doesn’t enjoy is having to get up early to go to the market because her husband can’t go with her. She has to go by herself and the area where she lives is on the outskirts of town and is dangerous. However, Mónica knows the risk is worth it because she finds her work to be very profitable. This is Mónica’s third loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and things have gone well for her. She expects to be able to continue the same and she wants to continue to be part of the group that works with Microfinanzas Prisma. With the PEN 1,500.00 that she has requested, she will buy ingredients and inputs to continue working in this business she likes so much.

loans.use: buy ingredients and inputs to continue working in this business she likes so much.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Nilsa

texts.es:
Nilsa es una mujer amable y alegre. Tiene 43 años vive en casa propia junto a uno de sus 3 hijos quienes ya son mayores, su esposo y un sobrino quien se quedo junto a ella porque su hermana se fue al extranjero.El negocio de Nilsa consiste en la venta de productos dietéticos. Formó un grupo de clientes a quienes denomina “grupo de la buena salud”, quienes muy temprano se van a su casa, lugar donde realiza sus ventas, para así poder tomar un desayuno nutritivo. En este negocio ella tiene que invertir mucho ya que los productos son muy caros. Sin embargo las ventas le dejan buenos márgenes de ganancia.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene contacto con mucha gente y es gratificante generar ganancias al mismo que contribuye a la vida saludable de las personas. Lo que no le gusta es tener que esperar mucho tiempo para ver los resultados pero es perseverante y sobre todo ama lo que hace.A ella le gustaría poder comprar más productos para así poder agrandar su negocio.
Este es el primer préstamo entre ella y MFP y espera poder ser una de las socias más puntuales y así no quedar mal con nadie del grupo.Ella con los 1000 soles solicitados comprará  productos dietéticos para tener más productos en stock.
texts.en:
Nilsa is a friendly and happy person. She is 43 years old and lives in her own house along with three children who are grown, her husband, and one nephew who stays with her because her sister went to work in another country. Nilsa’s business consists of selling diabetes products. She formed a group of clients that she calls “the good health group.” They come to her house very early to her house, where she makes her sales, so they can eat a nutritious breakfast. In this business she has to invest a lot because the products are very expensive. Even so, the sales give her a good profit margin. What she likes about her job is that she has contact with many people and it is gratifying to earn an income at the same time that she is contributing to people having a healthy life. What she doesn’t like is having to buy more products so that she can grow her business. 

This is her first loan with Microfinanzas Prisma and she expects to be one of the most punctual members so that she won’t disappoint anyone in the group. With the PEN 1,000.00 she requested, she will buy diabetes products so that she can have more products in stock.

loans.use: buy diabetes products so that she can have more products in stock.

loans.name: Kelly Yakeline

texts.es:
Kelly  de 29 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con el servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en el distrito de Pítipo que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.
	
Desde hace algunos años Kelly se dedica la venta de productos de primera necesidad (leche, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, fideos, etc) y de bebidas, su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su seguridad desde hace 3 años, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus productos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.

Para poder  ampliar su negocio ha solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más mercaderías, con el único ideal de que su negocio crezca y tenga productos más surtidos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.  Kelly es una persona dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por brindarles más comodidades a sus hijos y otras oportunidades académicas.
texts.en:
Kelly, 29, lives with her husband and two children in her own house that only has electricity and is located in Pítipo District belonging to Lambayeque Department.  This zone is noted for farming and cattle raising.

For several years now Kelly has been selling basic need items (milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna, noodles, etc.) and beverages.  Her business is located in her home for safety and it’s been operating for three years.  Profits obtained from sales of her products she tries to use to cover all her expenses and to improve her family’s standard of living.

In order to be able to expand the business she’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy more merchandise.  Her only goal is that the business grows and to have more stock merchandise available for her customers.  Kelly is a hardworking, dedicated person who strives to provide more comfort for her children as well as other academic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy larger amounts of stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Angela D. familia D. 52 años D. edad, vive con su esposo en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio D. luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD., la cual pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

angela desD. hace 5 años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. ganado ovino (tiene 12 ovejas), su corrales se encuentra en la parte externa D. su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo los ofrece en los diferentes mercados D. la zona y así obtiene buenas ganancias para solventar los gastos diarios D. su casa.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 600 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado y mejorar su corral, con los ingresos que obtenga pueD. cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad D. vida.  Angela es una mujer trabajadora y responsable que lo único que quiere es poder superarse y  mejorar económicamente para gozar D. algunas comodidades en su casa.
texts.en:
Ángela, 52, lives with her husband in her own house which only has electricity and is located in the rural part of TambogranD. District belonging to Piura Department.  This zone is noted for farming and cattle raising.

Ángela has been raising sheep (she has 12 sheep) for the last five years.  Her corrals are located outsiD. her house.  They are appropriate and spacious.  She feeds them nutritionally balanced feed and natural grasses and once they reach optimum growth she sells them in the various local markets thus obtaining good profits to cover her household’s daily expenses.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 600 new sol loan to buy nutritionally balanced feed and to do some improvements to her corral.  Income obtained will make it possible for her to repay the loan and improve her quality of life.  Ángela is a very hardworking, responsible person.  The only thing she wants is to get ahead and improve economically to enjoy some comfort at home.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced feed and to do some improvement to the corral.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 30 años es una mujer alegre, con ganas de salir adelante y trabajar duro para así poder dar una buena educación a sus dos hijos junto a su esposo con quien lleva varios años casada y comparte su casa que pudieron comprar con esfuerzo y trabajo.Elizabeth se dedica al transporte de carga de materiales y algunas otras cosas propias de la región llevándolas a otras regiones D. Perú. Todo lo realiza por la parte fluvial, lleva realizando este trabajo ya varios años junto a su esposo quien es el que se encarga de salir al puerto de Pucallpa a buscar a los clientes, mientras que ella se queda en su casa que funciona como oficina.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede compartir muchas cosas con su esposo además que se puede quedar en casa junto a sus hijos y dispone de tiempo para poder realizar algunas actividades que también le generan ingresos. Elizabeth está muy contenta pues tiene una muy buena cartera de clientes fijos con quienes trabaja ya varios años. Ella esta en proceso de arreglar su casa pues la utiliza como oficina de trabajo.Este es el sexto préstamo entre ella y la institución MFP, le gusta trabajar con este grupo ya que se siente contenta de tener compañeros responsables y sobre todo cumplidos.Con el préstamo solicitado 2500 soles ella pagara fletes para su transporte, además de comprar materiales para arreglar su oficina.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 30 years old, a happy woman who wants to succeed and work hard in order to provide a good education for her two children, along with her husband, to whom she has been married for several years and with whom she shares a house that they were able to buy with effort and hard work.  Elizabeth works in freight transport, of materials and other things specific to the region, carrying them to other areas in Peru.  She handles all the work by river, and has been doing this work for several years, along with her husband, who is responsible for going the Pucallpa port to look for customers, while she stays at the house, which functions as an office.

What she likes most about her work is that she can share many things with her husband, and can also stay at home with her children.  She also has time to engage in some activities that also generate income.  Elizabeth is very happy, for she has a very good portfolio of steady customers with whom she has worked for several years.  She is in the process of arranging her house, to use it as an office.  This is the sixth loan between her and MFP.  She likes working with this group, as she is happy to have responsible colleagues who are reliable.  With the loan requested (2,500 soles), she will pay for freight for transporting, and also buy material to improve her office.

loans.use: pay freight for transportation, in addition to buying materials to improve her office.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Juan Evangelista

texts.es:
Juan de 41 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta sólo con servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural de distrito de San Felipe que pertenece al departamento de Cajamarca.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera, artesana y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla Juan es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra lima, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de la zona donde vive y así puede obtener ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de su hogar. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto, con la finalidad de ofertarlo a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así tener mejoras económicas.  Juan es un padre de familia que se preocupa por que sus hijos tengan un futuro prometedor, lo que le va dar mucha alegría.
texts.en: Juan is 41 years old and lives with his family in his own house, which has only electricity. He lives in a rural area of the district of San Felipe in the province of Cajamarca. This area is known for agriculture, livestock, arts and crafts, and tourism. Juan’s business is agriculture, and he has his own land where he grows lime trees. He harvests his limes and sells them to different markets in the area in which he lives, thus making income to cover his household expenses. He is seeking a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1,000 nuevos soles in order to buy fertilizer to improve his soil and his harvests, with the goal of offering a better price to his customers, thereby improving his income. He is a father who wants to make certain that his children have a promising future, which will bring him much happiness.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to improve his soil and his harvests.

loans.name: Librando

texts.es:
Librando de 48 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Desde hace 3 años Librando se dedica a la preparación y venta de soya (es un granos que se remoja de un día para otro, luego se licua y por último se hierve con otros ingredientes quedando como un refresco), esta bebida es muy consumida por los pobladores en reemplazo de la leche, es muy agradable, su producto lo vende cerca al mercado de la zona donde vive, también cuenta con su propia clientela que le hace pedidos diarios y con esos ingresos pretende solventar sus obligaciones familiares.

Ha solicitado préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 600 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de soya para seguir comercializando y de animales de corral para criar y vender, con las ganacias que obtenga podrá pagar su crédito y ayudar a su familia.  Librando es una persona que con esfuerzo y trabajo saca adelante diariamente a su familia, lo que le da mucha alegría.
texts.en:
Librando is 48, and lives with his wife and children in their own house. The house only has electricity, and is located in the rural area of the Piura department. This area is characterized by farming, livestock-raising and tourism.

For three years Librando has been working on the preparation and sale of soy. The beans are soaked overnight, then liquified. Lastly, they are boiled with other ingredients, ending up as beverage. This drink is much consumed by the local people as a replacement for milk; it is very pleasant-tasting. He sells his product near the market of the area where he lives. He also has a his own clientele that order from him every day, and with this income he tries to meet his family obligations.  

He has applied to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 600 nuevos soles to buy more soy to keep selling, and to buy livestock to raise and sell.  With the earnings he gets he will be able to pay back the loan and help his family. Librando is a person who with hard work helps his family get ahead every day. This gives him much joy.

loans.use: To buy more soy beans and livestock to sell.

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos de 25 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Paijan que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Carlos desde hace algunos años cuenta con un puesto en el mercado de Paijan, donde vende carne de pollo al por mayor y menor, tiene su propia clientela por vender un producto de buena calidad y con mucha limpieza, con los ingresos que obtiene puede solventar sus necesidades personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme  Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de carne de pollo para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de sus clientes y con sus ganancias podrá pagar el crédito otorgado, también seguirá ayudando a sus padres económicamente en los gastos de la casa. Carlos es un hombre que desde joven empezó a trabajar para poder salir adelante en la vida y poderles brindar algunos gustos que desean sus padres.
texts.en:
Carlos is 25 years old, single, and lives in his parent's house, which has the basic utilities of water and electricity and is located in an urban area of the Paijan district in the department of La Libertad.  This is an area that is known for its farming, livestock production and tourism.

For a number of years, Carlos has had a stall in the Paijan market where he sells chicken meat at wholesale and retail.  He has his own customer base, because he sells good quality products that are very clean.  With the income he gets from this business he can cover his personal needs.

He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 2,000 Peruvian soles to buy a greater quantity of chicken meat so that he can continue to satisfy his customers' needs.  With his earnings he will be able to pay off the loan and continue to assist his parents in paying for the household expenses.   Carlos is man who started to work when he was very young in order to get ahead in life, and so that he could provide his parents with some special items that they wanted.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of chicken meat to sell

loans.name: Cynthia Fiorella

texts.es: Cynthia, es una joven soltera muy alegre, emprendedora y sobre todo con ganas de vivir y vive en casa propia junto a sus dos hermanas a quienes ayuda en su educación.Cynthia tiene dos trabajos, en uno de ellos es una tienda de abarrotes en su casa y quienes se encargan son sus hermanas, mientras que ella trabaja en el centro de la ciudad en una galería de libros y ropas. Ella viene realizando esta actividad  por varios años, mientras que lo de la tienda de abarrotes es algo reciente que emprendió hace aproximadamente un año.Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede generar dos ingresos a su hogar, además de enseñarles a sus menores hermanas que con esfuerzo se logran las cosas y que aprendan a trabajar desde pequeñas pero sin descuidar sus estudios. Lo que no le gusta es que tiene que desvelarse en ocasiones pues hace doble turno en su tienda ya que atiende ahí desde las 7 de la noche. Ella tiene en mente poder poner una tienda ropa propia para así ser independiente y no tener que dejar sola todo el tiempo a sus hermanas.Este es el tercer préstamo entre Cynthia y MFP, espera poder seguir trabajando juntos ya que es una socia responsable.Con el préstamo solicitado 2000 soles, ella comprará productos para su bodega, víveres, e implementara con unos andamios mas.
texts.en:
Cynthia is a cheerful, enterprising single young woman with a lust for life.  She lives in her own house with her two sisters who she helps to educate.  Cynthia has two jobs.  One is running a grocery store she has at home and that her two sisters take care of while she works downtown in a clothing and book store.  She’s been doing this work for several years while the grocery store is something more recent that she started about a year ago.

What she likes about her work is that she can earn two incomes for her home in addition to teaching her two younger sisters that with effort one can attain things and so that they will learn to work from a young age but without neglecting their studies.  What she doesn’t like is that sometime she has to work a double shift at the store and she has to stay out late; she starts work there at 7pm. She is thinking about opening her own clothing store to be independent and not leave her sisters unattended for so long.

This is Cynthia’s third MFP loan and she hopes to be able to continue working with us since she’s a responsible member.  She will use the requested 2000 new soles to buy stock items for her store, foodstuffs and to install more shelving.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store, foodstuffs and some shelving.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco de 33 años, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicado en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Marco desde hace 3 años se dedica a la comercialización de animales como (cerdos, ovejas y aves de corral), los cría en sus corrales que tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada, granos y pastos naturales, una vez que hayan completado su crecimiento ideal, los vende a sus clientes o en los diferentes mercados de la zona  y con los ingresos podrá cubrir sus necesidades y gastos familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para compra de alimento balanceado, una vez que los engorde los comercializa a sus clientes, con las ganancias que obtenga pagará el crédito otorgado y mejorará el nivel de vida de su familia. Marco con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo trata de salir adelante para seguir ayudando económicamente a su familia y brindarle a sus hijos mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
Marco, age 33, lives with his wife and children in his own house.  The house does not have the basic services.  It is located in the rural zone of the Tambogrande district in the Piura department.  The zone is known for farming, livestock, and handicrafts.

Marco has been selling animals like pigs, sheep, and poultry for three years.  He raises them in corrals that he has behind his house.  He feeds them balanced feed, grains, and natural fodder.  Once they have acquired their ideal growth he sells them to his customers or at different markets in the area.  With the income he will be able to cover the family’s necessities and expenses.

He has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy balanced feed.  Once he fattens the animals he sells them to his customers.  With the income he gets he will pay for the loan and improve his family’s standard of living.

With a lot of work and effort Marco tries to get ahead in order to continue helping his family financially and giving his children better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy balanced food to raise his animals.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis de 45 años de edad, vive con su hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana D. distrito de Ferreñafe que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turística.

Luis se dedica desde hace varios años como carpintero, fabricando y restaurando muebles, negocio que ha colocado en su mismo domicilio, tiene su clientela que por el buen trabajo que realiza ha ido en aumento, lo que le permitirá que con los ingresos que adquiera podrá cubrir todas sus  necesidades diarias de su casa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para la compra de madera para cumplir con los trabajos pendientes que tiene y con el dinero que gane podrá pagar su crédito y mejorar su nivel de vida.  Luis con su trabajo quiere brindarle a su hijo otras opciones de estudio.
texts.en:
Luis is 45 years old and lives with his son in his own home. He receives all basic services. Luis resides in an urban area in the District of Ferreñafe, which is part of Chiclayo Province. This area is known for its businesses involving agriculture, livestock breeding, and tourism.

Luis has worked as a carpenter for several years, making and restoring furniture. He operates his business out of his home. His customer base has increased as a result of the good work he produces. This has allowed him to generate income to cover all of his daily household necessities.

Luis is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN so that he can buy wood in order to complete his outstanding orders. With the money he earns, he will be able to repay the loan and improve his standard of living. Through his work, Luis wants to provide his son with educational options.

loans.use: to buy wood for completing his furniture orders.

loans.name: Luz Karim

texts.es:
Luz de 22 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Mórrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser  agrícola, ganadera y artesana.
	
Desde hace algún tiempo Luz se dedica a la venta de golosinas en su casa, también se dedica a la comercialización de aves de corral, los cría en los corrales que tiene en su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que hayan completado su crecimiento, los vende a sus clientes o en los diferentes mercados de Lambayeque y con los ingresos podrá cubrir sus necesidades familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles para comprar más aves de corral y golosinas, para seguir ofertándolos a sus clientes y con las ganancias poder pagar el crédito otorgado y mejorar su nivel de vida.  Luz con trabajo y dedicación ha logrado sacar adelante poco a poco a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Luz is 22 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and children. They receive services such as running water and electricity. Luz resides in the District of Mórrope, which is part of the Department of Lambayeque. This area is known for having businesses that involve agriculture, livestock breeding, and handicrafts.

Some time ago, Luz began selling candy from her home. She also sells poultry that she raises in coops at her house. The birds are fed a diet of balanced feed and natural grasses. Once they are fully grown, the birds are sold to her customers or at different markets throughout Lambayeque. With the income she earns, Luz is able to cover her family’s needs.

She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 800 PEN so that she can buy more chickens and candy in order to continue offering these products to her customers. With her earnings, Luz will be able to repay the loan and improve her standard of living. Through work and dedication, she will able more forward gradually with her children.

loans.use: to buy candy to sell and poultry to raise.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis alberto de 28 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Pomahuaca que pertenece al departamento de Cajamarca.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Luis Alberto se dedica a la agricultura, tiene sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra café y granadillas, actividad que realiza desde hace varios, además de ser productos muy consumido por las personas, una vez que realiza su cosecha lo comercializa en los diferentes mercados de la zona y fuera de ella,  con los ingresos que adquiera puede brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa.

A observar que su negocio va creciendo a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono para mejorar sus tierras y de ganado vacuno, con las ganancias que obtenga podrá pagar su crédito y solventar las necesidades diarias de su familia.  Luis alberto con trabajo y dedicación les brinda lo mejor a sus hijos y con la intensión de brindarles otras oportunidades académicas en un futuro cercano.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 28 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children. The only service he receives is electricity. Luis resides in the rural section of the District of Pomahuaca, which is part of the Department of Cajamarca. This area is known for having businesses that involve agriculture, livestock breeding, and tourism.

Luis Alberto is a farmer and has his own land on which he grows coffee and passion fruit. He has been farming for many years and his products are widely consumed. Once his crops are harvested, they are sold at different markets within and outside of the area. The income he generates enables him to provide a better quality of life for his wife and children.

Noticing that his business needs to grow, Luis Alberto is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2000 PEN in order to buy compost to improve his land and help his cattle. With the revenue he generates, Luis will be able to repay the loan and meet the daily needs of his family. Through work and dedication, Luis Alberto will supply the best for his children and intends to provide them with other academic opportunities in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase compost for his land.

loans.name: Martha Beatriz

texts.es:
Martha de 55 años, es soltera, vive en casa de unos familiares, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Monsefú que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona de alta actividad comercial, turismo y en los sitios aledaños agricultura y ganadería.

Desde hace varios años Martha se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, su negocio lo tiene en su propia casa, cuenta con su propia clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades diarias personales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar telas para seguir elaborando sus prendas de vestir y vender a su clientela y así podrá obtener mayores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida. Martha es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa que siempre trata que su salir adelante a pesar de las dificultades que a veces se presentan en la vida.
texts.en:
Martha is 55 years old, single, and lives at the home of some relatives. They receive all of the basic services. Martha resides in an urban area in the District of Monsefú, which is part of Chiclayo Province. This area has a high amount of activity in the retail and tourism sectors. There are areas nearby for farming and livestock breeding.

Martha has been sewing and selling garments for several years. She operates her business at home and has her own customer base. With the income she earns, Martha is able to cover her daily personal needs.

She is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 3000 PEN in order to buy fabrics so that she can continue producing clothes to sell to her customers. As a result, she will be able to generate more income for improving her quality of life. Martha is a hardworking and earnest woman who always tries to press forward despite the difficulties that sometimes occur in life.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for producing clothes.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro de 36 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, sus hijos viven independientemente, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicado en el distrito de San José que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque.  Estas zonas se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

La actividad que desarrolla Alejandro  es brindar el servicio de transporte público, ya que cuenta con su propia mototaxi, la cual lo trabaja mañana y tarde movilizando personas que viven en San José y también a los distintos caseríos de la zona, cuenta con su propia clientela y con los ingresos que obtenga puede cubrir sus gastos de su casa.

Ha solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para brindarle mantenimiento a su mototaxi y seguir brindando un buen servicio.  Alejandro es una persona muy conocida en el lugar donde vive porque siempre se preocupa por el bienestar de los suyos, con el fin que en un futuro pueda brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 36 years old and lives in his own home with his family. His children live independently. Alejandro receives all basic services. He resides in the District of San José, which is part of the Department of Lambayeque. This area has businesses that involve agriculture, livestock breeding, and handicrafts.

Alejandro has a business providing public transportation services with his own motorcycle taxi. He works in the mornings and the afternoons, driving around people who live in San José. Alejandro also travels to different villages in the area. He has his own customer base and the income he earns is used to cover his household expenses.

Alejandro is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 PEN in order to maintain his motorcycle taxi so that he can continue providing good service. He is a person who is well-known in the place where he lives because he is always concerned about the welfare of his family. His goal for the future is to provide them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Maria Rosalia

texts.es:
María D. 67 años D. edad, vive en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio D. agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito D. Túcume que pertenece al departamento D. Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser  agrícola, ganadera, artesana y turismo.
	
DesD. hace algún tiempo María se dedica a la venta D. golosinas en puesto que ha colocado en una zona concurrida del lugar donD. vive, también venD. periódicos y con los ingresos podrá cubrir sus necesidades diarias.
	
Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más golosinas y bebidas, para seguir ofertándolos a sus clientes y con las ganancias poder pagar el crédito otorgado y mejorar su nivel D. vida.  María con trabajo y dedicación ha logrado salir adelante por sus propios medios.
texts.en:
María is 67 years old and lives in her own home. She receives services, such as running water and electricity. María resides in the District of Túcume, which is part of the Department of Lambayeque. This area is known for its businesses involving agriculture, livestock breeding, handicrafts, and tourism.

For some time, María has been selling candy from a stand established in a busy area in the place where she lives. She also sells newspapers and the income she generates is used to cover her daily needs.

María is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 PEN in order to buy more candy and beverages so that she can continue offering these products to her customers. With her earnings, María will be able to repay the loan and improve her standard of living. Through work and dedication, she will able to move forward as a result of her own efforts.

loans.use: to stock her business with candy and beverages.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio de familia de 68 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Emilio desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales, una vez que lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo los ofrece en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtiene buenas ganancias para solventar los gastos diarios de su casa.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado, con los ingresos que obtenga puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Emilio es una persona trabajadora y responsable que lo único que quiere es poder superarse y  mejorar económicamente para gozar de algunas comodidades en su casa.
texts.en:
Emilio is 68 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children. They do not receive basic services. He resides in the rural section of the District of Tambogrande, which is part of the Department of Piura. This area is known for its businesses that involve agriculture, livestock breeding, and handicrafts.

Emilio has been raising and selling sheep for several years. The animals are kept behind his house in a pen that has an appropriate and ample amount of space. They are fed a diet of balanced feed and natural grasses. Once the animals have reached optimal growth, they are offered at different markets in the area. With the money he earns, Emilio is able to cover his daily household needs.

He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 800 PEN in order to buy balanced feed. With the revenue he generates, Emilio will be able to repay his loan and improve his quality of life. He is a hardworking and responsible person who only wants to succeed and improve financially so that he can obtain a few household comforts.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for his animals.

loans.name: Rudy

texts.en:
Rudy is a married 54-year-old man living in Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. He has four grown children. Rudy's house is located near the sea. Every day, Rudy prays for calm weather conditions because his income is dependent on it. He has been fishing for 10 years. Most often, he earns 6,748 PHP each month. 

Having inadequate income for his family pushed Rudy to join GDMPC. He needed access to financial services. His first loan application is for 5,000 PHP. The money is intended to purchase materials needed to repair his fishing boat. With the revenue made possible by this loan, Rudy hopes to buy one new tiny-holed fishing net.

loans.use: To purchase materials to repair his fishing boat

loans.name: Editha

texts.en: Editha is a 51-year-old widowed woman living in Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She cares for her two grown children. Supporting her family by herself is not an easy task. She has to spend double or triple the time working in order to earn enough money. For ten years, Editha has worked buying and selling recyclable items. She buys used recyclable items to sell to other buyers. This work earns her a monthly income of 6,464 PHP. Earlier this year, Editha applied for her first loan from GDMPC, a loan of 5,000 PHP. The money is intended to acquire more recyclable items such as empty bottles, cans, rusted iron, etc., to re-sell. Editha hopes to find a buyer that will offer a higher price. She also hopes to own a tricycle (three-wheeled) transport service in the future.

loans.use: To purchase recyclabe items for resale

loans.name: Helen

texts.en: Helen is 46 years old, married, and lives in Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental, Philippines, with her two grown children. To earn a living, she has sold snack items at a reasonable price in the local community for 11 years. Every month, she earns PHP 3,900. Earlier this year, she joined GDMPC to have access to financial services. Her first loan application of PHP 5,000 has been approved. The loaned amount will be used to purchase snack items to sell such as banana cake, hot cake, ice candy and more. Helen hopes to have a permanent food stall in the school nearby to increase her monthly income.

loans.use: To purchase snack items to sell such as banana cake, hot cakes, ice candy and more.

loans.name: Justina

texts.en: Justina is 54 years old and married. She is from Aurora Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She has two grown children who have helped her in taking care of their crops. They took good care of this corn production activity for two years and she receives PHP 8,000 a month. Although a tiresome and irritating activity, yet, the family managed. In 2008, Justina joined GDMPC. She has requested a loan of PHP 6,000  from the organization to purchase corn fertilizer, and for weeding costs. She hopes for a bountiful harvest and to expand her cultivated area.

loans.use: To purchase corn fertilizer and cost of weeding.

loans.name: Alberta

texts.en: Alberta is a 61-year-old widow living in Aurora, Zambo, del Sur, Philippines. She has one adult-aged child. Five years ago, Alberta started operating her own retail store at home. The business showed a good flow of operations and sustained her livelihood. Every month, she earns PHP 5,000. Earlier this year, Alberta joined GDMPC. Her loan of PHP 5,000 has been approved by the cooperative. The money will be used to purchase high-demand grocery items to sell. She plans to repair the store's native roof and expand the business area.

loans.use: To purchase high-demand grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is 61 years old and married with two adult children. She is from Aurora, Zambo, del Sur, Philippines. She has been a dressmaker for 11 years. Together with her husband, she creates dresses of all kinds -- casual, jeans, basketball uniforms, etc. Every month she earns PHP 10,000. She became a GDMPC member in 2007. Teresita is applying for her third loan of PHP 5,000. The money is intended to purchase dressmaking materials such as sewing threads, bobbin cases, etc. She is hoping to have more orders and buy another sewing machine for fast and good output.

loans.use: To purchase dressmaking materials such as sewing threads, bobbin case, etc.

loans.name: Diosalou

texts.en: Diosalou is 28 years old. She is married and lives in Aurora, Zambo. del Sur, Philippines. She has one school-aged child. She has owned and operated a retail store for three years to earn a living. Every month, she receives PHP 5,000. Earlier this year, Diosalou joined GDMPC. She has applied for a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase grocery items to sell. She plans to expand the business to make more income.

loans.use: To purchase grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena, age 47, has operated a snack vending business for seven years. She truly enjoys her work and earns PHP 3,000 per month from her business. She and her husband have two grown children and live in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur.

In 2007, Nena joined GDMPC. She has applied for a loan of PHP 5,000 from the cooperative to purchase snack items to vend.  

She hopes to improve the business and offer more items for sale.

loans.use: To purchase snack items to vend

loans.name: Sulpicia

texts.en:
Sulpicia is a 57 year-old widow.  She is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines.  She lives with her only child.  Sulpicia sells Avon products in the local community and in neighboring communities.  She has done this for 2 years.  Every month, Sulpicia makes a total of PHP 6,000. 

Sulpicia wants to expand the business and joined GDMPC earlier this year for that purpose. The loan amount applied for and approved by the cooperative is worth PHP 5,000. The money is intended to order additional cosmetic products from Avon to sell.  With anticipated profits, Sulpicia hopes to meet her business expansion plan and have more beauty products to offer.

loans.use: To order additional cosmetic products from Avon to sell.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is from Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is separated from her husband and is the mother of one grown child. Carmen is 57 years old. To live, she has spent 31 years of her life sewing different styles of dress. She accepts orders and makes her own designs, too.  One good thing about it - Carmen owns the sewing machine and is not merely working for other tailoring shops.  She makes approximately PHP 3,800 a month.

This year Carmen joined GDMPC. On her first loan application, she has requested PHP 5,000. This will be used to purchase sewing materials, such as threads, fabrics, etc.  Carmen hopes to receive more orders and create gorgeous and salable designs, using the additional sewing supplies, to increase her monthly sales.

loans.use: To purchase sewing materials such as thread, textiles, etc.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 35 years old and married. She is from Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines.  To make a living, she gardens the vacant lot near the house. Various types of crops such as string beans, tomatoes, squash and many others, have been planted. She sells PHP 3,000 worth of crops a month.
Gina wants to expand the cultivated area as a way to increase her income each month. She joined GDMPC this year to realize her desire. Her first loan application is worth PHP 5,000.  With this, she can now acquire a variety of seed/seedlings to grow, and she will use up the vacant planting area.

loans.use: To acquire a variety of seeds/seedlings to grow.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 35 years old. She is from Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines. She is married, with 2 school-aged children to attend to. For 1 year, Jocelyn has been enjoying her new livelihood.  She peddles deliciously-cooked foods around the community and has put a temporary food station outside the house. She makes PHP 5,000 from it every month.

This year Jocelyn became one of the registered GDMPC members. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy foods and drinks as additional products to offer.  In this way, she can improve her general living conditions and earn more to use for business expansion.

loans.use: To purchase foods and drinks to sell.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 61 years old and is married.  She has 6 grown children. She is living in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines.  Marcelina is a charcoal seller and has proved her business ability for 30 years. For some, it is hard, tiring and dirty work.  But for Marcelina, it is work to value since she was nurtured with that kind of activity from an early age. Every month, she receives PHP 6,200.

Marcelina was an official GDMPC member in 2007. With this 4th loan, worth PHP 10,000, she plans to purchase materials for producing charcoal for sale. She is hoping to make more income from the additional investment.

loans.use: To purchase materials in producing charcoals for sale.

loans.name: Maylinda

texts.en:
Maylinda is 30 years old and married. She is from Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She has lovingly and patiently taken good care of her 5 school-aged children. Maylinda, together with her husband, has been selling lumber for 5 years. The couple is gradually acquiring business related facilities to improve the services offered. The business gives a monthly cash inflow of PHP 20,000. 

Maylinda has to sustain her livelihood as it is the sole source of income for the household. In 2008, she became an official GDMPC member. This loan, amounting to PHP 50,000, is the 13th loan application she has had with GDMPC. She intends to purchase lumber supplies to update her service offerings. Maylinda hopes to produce a variety of lumber supplies for sale and to innovate the business sales area.

loans.use: to purchase lumber facilities to update service offerings.

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en:
Sheila is 44 years old and married. She is from Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is taking care of her 5 children. She owns and operates a retail store at home to earn a living. For 5 years of running the store, Sheila typically gets PHP 8,700 a month.

In 2007, Sheila joined GDMPC. The cooperative had approved her 9th loan application, of PHP 20,000, which will be used to buy additional products to sell such as grocery items, school and office supplies, etc. With the loan taken, Sheila hopes for further improvement of the business operations to gain more income.

loans.use: to buy additional products to sell such as grocery items, school and office supplies, etc.

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en:
